Question: rd aml
Answer: ry aykt saarf antrfys 123 bnanay kay liye jawa askrpt laibryry haay۔yha fys bk nay tyar kya tha aur UI ajzaaa 3 ki tamyr kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔rd aml ko btdryj apnanay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، is ka mtalb hay keh aap is main sy kam ya zayada sy zayada astamal krsktay hain js ki aap ko zurwrt haay۔ry aykt apnay aalanyha khyalat kay liye jana jata hay ، jo kwda ko daybgh 2 kay liye zayada pysh ghwiy aur aasan bna dyta haay۔ aar aay sy ty dawylprza ko ankpswlytda ajzaaa bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay jo apni ryast ka antzaam karty hain ، jo is kay bad pychydha UIS2 bnanay kay liye tshkyl diya jaskta haay۔rd aml kay ajzaaa main ayk ryndar () tarykha hawta hay jo un pt dayta lyta hay aur dasplay 2 ko kya waps krta haay۔ry aykt dawylprza ko dyghr laibryrywn aur frym wrk 2 kay sath antrfys karnay ki bhi ajazat dyta haay۔ aar aay sy ty main dawylprza aur dayzaainrza ki ayk bray jmaat hay jo mdd aur mdd fraham krskty haay۔ry aykt tym mstkl tawr par rd aml ko bhatr bnanay kay tarykwn par thakyk kar rahi hay ، aur sirf saabt nktaha nzar rd aml ka ayk hasaha bn jata haay۔ agar aap ko rd aml sykhnay main dlchspy hay tou ، bohat sary wsail dstyab hayn۔ry aykt wyb sait ayk tywtwryl aur aan lain kwda play ghraؤndaza 1 kay lnks mhaya krty haay۔wyb sait kay pas mrkzay tsawrat kay liye ayk rhanma aur un lwghwn kay liye ayk amly tywtwryl bhi hay jo 1 kar kay sykhnay ko trjyha dytay hayn۔W3SCHOOLS bhi HTML PAGE3.1REACTJS2REACTJS3W3SCHOOLS4REACT main rd aml ko shaml karnay kay liye ayk kwiyk astart tywtwryl bhi fraham krta haay۔

Question: rd aml kay ajzaaa kay tsawr aur saarf kay antrfys ki tamyr main un kay krdar ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml kay ajzaaa ry aykt ayply kyshnza 123 kay bldangh blaks hayn۔wha UI kay alag thlgh tkraay hain jo poray ayply kyshn 12 main dwbarha astamal hawsktay hayn۔ayk rd aml ka jzaw ayk jawa askrpt fnkshn hay jsay mark ap 1 kay sath chhrakaya jaskta haay۔ajzaaa ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk HTML anasar kay tawr par swcha jaskta hay jo dawylpr apni ayply kyshnza 2 main tshkyl aur astamal krsktay hayn۔ REACT ajzaaa apni apni ryast ka antzaam krsktay hain ، js ka mtalb hay keh woh khud sakhtha aur dwbarha astamal kay kabl hawsktay hayn۔kmplyks UIS13 bnanay kay liye ajzaaa bhi tshkyl dyiay jasktay hayn۔rd aml kay ajzaaa main ayk ryndar () tarykha hawta hay jo un pt dayta lyta hay aur kya dasplay 3 ko lwtata haay۔ryndar () ka tarykha kar ko askryn 3 par pysh karnay kay liye zamha dar haay۔ aar aay sy ty ajzaaa klaswn ya afaal 4 ka astamal karty hoey bnaiay jasktay hayn۔tabkaty ajzaaa zayada taaktwr hawtay hain aur woh ryast ka antzaam krsktay hain ، jabky fnkshnl ajzaaa aasan hain aur sirf prwps 4 wsawl krsktay hayn۔fnkshnl ajzaaa ko aam tawr par trjyha di jati hay kywnkha un ko prahnay aur tyst karnay main aasany hawty haay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml kay ajzaaa rd aml ki ayply kyshnza kay bldangh blaks hayn۔wha UI kay dwbarha kabl astamal tkraay hain jo apni ryast ka antzaam krsktay hain aur pychydha UIs bnanay kay liye tyar hawsktay hayn۔rd aml kay ajzaaa klaswn ya afaal ka astamal karty hoey tkhlyk kyay jasktay hain ، lekin fnkshnl ajzaaa ko aam tawr par trjyha di jati haay۔

Question: rd aml main jay ays ayks kya haay؟yha bakaadha HTML sy kis tarah mkhtlf haay؟
Answer: jay ays ayks ka mtalb jawa askrpt XML hay aur jawa askrpt ki ayk khasa bwly hay jo dawylprza ko REACT123 main HTML lkhnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔JSX REACT2 main HTML lkhna aur shaml karna aasan bnata haay۔jay ays ayks dawylprza ko jawa askrpt main aych ty aym ayl anasar lkhnay aur baghair kesi krytylmnt () awr/ya apyndachailda () tarykwn 2 kay dawm main rkhnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔jay ays ayks nay aych ty aym ayl tyghza ko ry aykt anasar main tbdyl kya۔ jay ays ayks kuch tarykwn sy bakaadha aych ty aym ayl sy mkhtlf haay۔yha jawa askrpt kay tasarat ko lpytnay kay liye ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta whadany ka astamal krta hay aur sy ays ays klaswn ki wzuahat karnay kay liye klas kay bjaiay klas nam ka astamal krta haay۔JSX ka astamal karty wkt mhafwza mtalwbha alfaza ko brkrar rkhna chahaiay۔msaal kay tawr par ، HTML main wsaf JSX main HTMLFOR hay kywnkha jawa askrpt kay mhafwza krdha sab sy aam main sy ayk haay۔jay ays ayks nhaw ، talyf ، aur mhafwza krdha mtalwbha alfaza main bakaadha aych ty aym ayl sy mkhtlf haay۔

Question: rd aml kay jzaw aur un kay astamal kay laif saiykl tarykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml kay ajzaaa main ayk laif saiykl hay js main tyn aham mrahal shaml hayn: brahtay hoey ، ap dayt ، aur ghair mnkwlha 1234۔har mrhalay main mkhtlf tarykay hawtay hain jn ko jzaw kay laif saikl 15234 main mkhsawsa nkat par talb kya jata haay۔yha tarykay dawylprza ko apni zandghy bhr main ajzaaa par kabw panay aur is main trmym karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، tkhlyk sy la kar tbahay 15234 tk۔ hr mrhalay main 15234 main laif saiykl tarykwn ka khlasaha haay: brahtay hoey fasknstrktr (): ajzaaa ki ryast ko shrwa krta haay۔ryast prwpys ryndar () main tbdylywn par mbny ryast: jay ays ayks ko lwtata hay jo dawm daat kam pywntyw daydawmaؤnt () ko pysh kya jaye gha: jzaw ko dawm main pysh karnay kay bad is par aml draamd hawta haay۔yha woh jghha hay jahan aap zumny asarat anjam dy saktay hain ، jesay kesi API sy dayta lana۔: tazaha kary shuda jay ays ayks ko waps krta hay jo dawm daat ghytsnap shat byfwr ap dayt () ko pysh kya jaye gha: is sy pehlay keh is ki tazaha kary hawjaiay۔yha woh jghha hay jahan aap zumny asarat anjam dy saktay hain ، jesay dawm ko ap dayt krna۔yha woh jghha hay jahan aap safaiy anjam dy saktay hain ، jesay keh aywnt kay snnay walon ko khtm krna۔ un tarykwn kay alawha ، is main hayndal karnay kay tarykay bhi mwjwd hain jo ajzaaa kay laif saikl 4 kay doran pysh aanay wali ghltaywn ko pkranay aur snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔tyn mrahal par mushtamil haay: brahtay hoey ، ap dayt ، aur ghair mnkwlha۔har mrhalay main mkhtlf tarykay hawtay hain jn ko jzaw kay laif saiykl main mkhsawsa nkat par talb kya jata haay۔yha tarykay dawylprza ko tkhlyk sy la kar tbahay tak ، apnay zandghy bhr main ajzaaa par kabw panay aur is main trmym karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔

Question: rd aml main kntrwl aur bay kabw ajzaaa main kya frk haay؟
Answer: kntrwl aur bay kabw ajzaaa REACT123456 main farm dayta ko snbhalnay kay do mkhtlf tarykay hayn۔ kntrwl waly ajzaaa wahi hain jn main farm dayta ko jzaw kay astyt 12356 kay zaryaha snbhala jata haay۔kntrwl shuda ajzaaa main ، waldyn ka jzaw jzaw ki haalt ka antzaam krta hay ، aur jzaw ko apni mwjwdha kymt aur prwps 25 kay zaryaha ap dayt kal byk mil jata haay۔jb saarf jzaw kay sath taaml krta hay tou ، waldyn ka jzaw ryast ko ap dayt krta hay ، js kay ntyjay main jzaw ki kymt 25 ko ap dayt krta haay۔kntrwl shuda ajzaaa ka farm anasar aur aadad wa shmar par bhatr kntrwl hay ، aur un ki haalt ko bay nkab kya gaya hay aur isy braha rast hayra phyry ki jaskty hay ، js ki wjha sy woh tyst 25 main aasan bnatay hayn۔ ghair mtzalzal ajzaaa wahi hain jn kay liye farm ka dayta dawm khud 123456 kay zaryaha snbhala jata haay۔bay kabw ajzaaa main ، jzaw apni dakhly haalt ko brkrar rkhta hay ، aur farm kay aadad wa shmar ko DOM123456 kay zaryaha snbhala jata haay۔bay kabw ajzaaa ko ry aykt astyt kay zaryaha kntrwl nahin kya jata hay ، aur un ki haalt bay nkab nahin hawty hay ، js ki wjha sy woh tyst 25 ko mshkl bnatay hayn۔ kntrwl aur bay kabw ajzaaa kay mabyn antkhab prwjykt ki anfrady zurwryat aur zurwryat par mnhasar haay۔kntrwl shuda ajzaaa aadad wa shmar par zayada kntrwl brdasht karty hain ، lekin agar aap bay kabw ajzaaa ka astamal zayada aaram dha hain tou ، woh ayk bhatr antkhab 156 hawsktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، kntrwl shuda ajzaaa woh hain jn main farm kay aadad wa shmar ko jzaw ki haalt sy snbhala jata hay ، jabky bay kabw ajzaaa woh hain jn kay liye hayn۔jsay farm dayta khud dawm kay zaryaha snbhala jata haay۔kntrwl waly ajzaaa ka farm anasar aur dayta par bhatr kntrwl hay ، jabky bay kabw ajzaaa ko janchna mshkl haay۔kntrwl aur bay kabw ajzaaa kay mabyn antkhab prwjykt ki anfrady zurwryat aur zurwryat par mnhasar haay۔

Question: rd aml main ryast kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh ajzaaa kay andr is ka antzaam kesay kya jata haay۔
Answer: ryast rd aml ka ayk tsawr hay jo aadad wa shmar sy mrad hay jo ayk jzaw andrwny tawr par 123456 ko brkrar rkhta haay۔ryast ka astamal aysay aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata hay jo wkt kay sath sath tbdyl hawsktay hain ، jesay saarf kay un pt ya dayta ko API123456 sy haasal kya jata haay۔ astyt syt astyt () tarykha 1346 ka astamal karty hoey ajzaaa main mnzam kya jata haay۔syt astyt () ka tarykha kesi jzaw ki haalt ko ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur yeh ayk aysy chyza lyta hay jo ajzaaa 1346 ki niy haalt ki nmaindghy krta haay۔jb ryast main tbdyly aaty hay tou ، rd aml ko niay astyt 1346 ki akasy karnay kay liye jzaw ko dwbarha pysh krta haay۔ astyt ko kesi tabkaty jzaw kay knstrktr main shrwa kya jaskta hay ya kesi fnkshnl ajzaaa 1245 main usestate () hak ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔tabkaty ajzaaa main ، ryast ko jzaw klas ki praprty kay tawr par byan kya jata hay ، jabky fnkshnl ajzaaa main ، ryast ki wzuahat USESTATE () hak 25 ka astamal karty hoey ki jati haay۔ajzaaa 123456 main prwps ya hasab ktab۔ryast ka zayada astamal karkrdghy kay msail ka baasa bn sakta hay aur ajzaaa 123456 kay tarza aml kay baray main astdlal karna mshkl bna sakta haay۔ khlasaha main ، ryast woh aadad wa shmar hay jsay ayk jzaw dakhly tawr par rd aml main brkrar rkhta haay۔ryast ko syt astyt () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ajzaaa kay andr antzaam kya jata hay ، aur isy kesi klas jzaw kay knstrktr main ya kesi fnkshnl jzaw main usestate () hak ka astamal karty hoey shrwa kya jaskta haay۔ryast ko thwraa sa aur sirf aadad wa shmar kay liye astamal kya jana chahaiay jo kesi jzaw kay liye mkhsawsa hay aur prps sy akhza nahin kya jaskta hay ya jzaw main hasab nahin kya jaskta haay۔

Question: aap rd aml main waldyn aur bchwn kay ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta kesay pas karty hayn؟
Answer: REACT12345 main waldyn aur bchwn kay ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta ko mntkl karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hayn: prwps: waldyn kay jzaw sy bchwn kay jzaw main dayta ko mntkl karnay ka sab sy bnyady aur aam tawr par astamal hony wala tarykha prwps 12345 kay zaryaay haay۔praprtyza kay liye mkhtsar ، sirf prahnay wali akdar hain jo waldyn kay jzaw sy bchwn kay jzaw 12345 main mntkl hawty hayn۔waldyn ka jzaw kesi bhi aadad wa shmar ko bchwn kay ajzaaa ko prwps kay tawr par mntkl krskta hay ، bshmwl mtghyrat ya afaal 61245. kal byks: bchwn kay jzaw sy waldyn kay jzaw main dayta mntkl karnay ka ayk aur tarykha kal byk byk 24 astamal krkay haay۔as nktaha nzar main ، waldyn ka jzaw ayk kal byk fnkshn ko prwp 24 kay tawr par bchwn kay jzaw par bhyjta haay۔as kay bad bchwn ka jzaw is fnkshn ko kal krskta hay aur dayta ko waldyn kay ajzaaa 24 ko mntkl krskta haay۔yha aap ko aysay ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta shyir karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jo braha rast ayk dusray sy mtalk nahin hayn۔yha laibryryan ayk mrkzay astwr mhaya krty hain js tak ayply kyshn 12 main kesi bhi jzaw tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml main waldyn aur bchwn kay ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta pas karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hain ، bshmwl prps ، kal byks ، syak wa sbak API ، aur astyt mynjmnt laibryrywn ka astamal۔waldyn kay jzaw sy dayta ko bchwn kay jzaw main mntkl karnay ka sab sy bnyady aur aam tawr par astamal shuda tarykha hay ، jabky kal byks ko kesi bchay kay jzaw sy waldyn kay jzaw main dayta mntkl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tarykha ka antkhab prwjykt ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur zurwryat par mnhasar haay۔

Question: rd aml haks kya hayn؟aam tawr par astamal hony waly haks aur un kay mkasad ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt haks aysay afaal hain jo dawylprza ko klas 123456 lkhay baghair ryast aur dyghr rd aml ki khsawsayat ko astamal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔haks ko rd aml 16.8 main mtaarf kraya gaya tha aur klas par mbny ajzaaa 4 lkhnay ka mtbadl fraham kya gaya tha۔haks dawylprza ko mkamy ryast ، asarat aur syak wa sbak kay sath kam karnay ki ajazat dytay hain jesay ywsstyt () ، yw ays ay ayf ay sy ty () ، aur yw ays ay sy tnt () 456. yahan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly rd aml kay haks aur un kay mkasad 12456 hayn: yeh hak astamal hawta haay۔fnkshnl ajzaaa main ryast ka antzaam krna۔yha do anasar kay sath ayk saf lwtata haay: mwjwdha ryasty kymt aur astyt 12456 ko ap dayt karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn۔ useeffect (): yeh hak fnkshnl ajzaaa main zumny asarat ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha dawylprza ko zumny asarat anjam denay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jesay kesi API sy dayta lana ya DOM ko ap dayt karna ، jzaw kay bad 12456.usecontext (): yeh hak syak wa sbak fraham karnay waly sy dayta astamal karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as sy dawylprza ko aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat mlty hay jo jzaw kay drkht kay zaryaay hr staha par dsty tawr par ghzarnay kay baghair ghzar jata haay۔yha dawylprza ko DOM ansar ki khsawsayat ko braha rast 12456 tak rsaiy aur is main trmym karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ ywzardawsr (): yeh hak pychydha ayply kyshnza main ryast ka antzaam karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as sy dawylprza ko rydawsr fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ryast ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، isi tarah ki ryast ko rydawks 12456.usecallback () main kis tarah mnzam kya jata haay: yeh hak kesi fnkshn ko yaddasht karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as sy dawylprza ko ghair zurwry dwbarha ryndarza 12456 ko rwknay kay zaryaay apni drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml haks aysay kam hain jo dawylprza ko klas lkhay baghair ryast aur dyghr rd aml ki khsawsayat ko astamal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔aam tawr par astamal hony waly ry aykt haks main usestate () ، useefefect () ، usecontext () ، useref () ، saarf tyar () ، aur usecallback () shaml hayn۔har hak ka ayk khasa mksad hawta hay aur is ka astamal ryast ، asarat ، syak wa sbak ، aur fnkshnl ajzaaa main bohat kuch kay antzaam kay liye kya jaskta haay۔

Question: wrchwil dawm aur is ki ahamyt ko rd aml main smjhaiyn۔
Answer: wrchwil dawm rd aml main ayk tsawr hay js sy mrad asal DOM123456 ki halky wzan kapy haay۔rd aml main ، hr dawm ansar main isi tarah ka wrchwil dawm aabjykt 123456 hawta haay۔wrchwil dawm main asal dawm ki tarah hi khsawsayat hain ، lekin is main askryn 123456 par jo kuch hay isy braha rast tbdyl karnay ki taakt ka fkdan haay۔ wrchwil dawm rd aml main aham hay kywnkha is sy ayply kyshn 123456 ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mlty haay۔asal DOM main hayra phyry karna sst hay aur karkrdghy ko mtasar krskta hay ، khasa tawr par jab bar bar ap dayts 123456 hawtay hayn۔wrchwil dawm ayk aysa tarykha kar mhaya krta hay jo dsty dawm hayra phyry ko dawylpr sy door krta hay ، js sy mazeed pysh kyasy kwda 5 lkhnay main mdd mlty haay۔ jab kesi jzaw ki ryasty tbdylywn main rd aml main tbdyly aaty hay tou ، wrchwil dawm asal DOM123456 ki bjaiay ap dayt hawjata haay۔as kay bad rd aml niay wrchwil dawm ka mwazanha wrchwil dawm asnyp shat kay sath krta hay jo ap dayt 25 sy pehlay hi liya gaya tha۔pry ap dayt wrzen kay sath niay wrchwil dawm ka mwazanha krkay ، aadad wa shmar ka rdaml zaahar karain keh kon sy wrchwil dawm aabjykt 25 main tbdyl hoa haay۔as aml ko mfahamt kaha jata hay ، aur jab UI25.in khlasaha ko dwbarha pysh karty wkt kam sy kam DOM aapryshnwn ki ghnty karnay ki ajazat dyta hay tou ، wrchwil dawm rd aml main asal DOM ki halka phlka kapy haay۔as sy dawylpr sy door dsty dawm hayra phyry ko khlasaha krkay atalak ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mlty haay۔jb kesi jzaw ki ryast tbdyl hawty hay tou wrchwil dawm ap dayt hawjata hay ، aur jab UI.1nowlegehut2codecademy3me4geeksforgeeks5logreke6pieces ko dwbarha pysh karty hayn۔

Question: aap rd aml main wakaat ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟rd aml kay ajzaaa main aywnt sy nmtnay ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: rd aml main wakaat ko hayndal karna DOM anasar 123 par wakaat ko snbhalnay kay mtradf haay۔rd aml kay wakaat msanway wakaat hain ، jo braؤzar kay aabaiy wakaha 1 kay aas pas kras braؤzar rypr hayn۔rd aml kay wakaat ka nam kmyl kys 23 kay bjaiay awnt kys ka astamal karty hoey rakha jata haay۔jay ays ayks kay sath ، aap strngh 23 kay bjaiay aywnt hayndalr ki haysayt sy kesi fnkshn ko pas karty hayn۔ ry aykt ajzaaa 1423 main aywnt hayndalngh ki kuch msaalyn hayn: btn klks ko snbhalnay kay liye aan klyk ka astamal: fnkshn hayndal klyk () {alrt ('btn par klk kya ghya!') ؛} ؛}fnkshn btn () {rytrn (<btn aan klyk = {hayndal klyk}> mujhey </buttic>) ؛ input un pt tbdylywn ko snbhalnay kay liye aan chynj ka astamal karty hawiay: fnkshn hayndalchynj (wakaha) {knswl.lagh (aywnt.tarjt.alyw) ؛} fnkshnan pt () {rytrn (<an pt ki ksm = "mtn" aan chynj = {hayndal chynj} />) ؛} farm ki ghzaarshat ko snbhalnay kay liye awnsmyt ka astamal karty hawiay: fnkshn hayndalswbyt (wakaha) {aywnt.prywynt dayfalt () ؛knswl.lagh ('farm jma kraya ghya!') ؛} fnkshn farm () {rytrn (<farm aanswbyt = {hayndalswbyt}> <btn ki ksm = "jma krwaiyn"> jma karain </btn> </farm>) ؛} khlasaha main ،rd aml main aywnt sy hayndalngh dawm anasar par wakaat ko snbhalnay kay mtradf haay۔rd aml kay wakaat msanway wakaat hawtay hain ، aur aap strngh kay bjaiay aywnt kay hayndalr ki haysayt sy kesi fnkshn ko mntkl karty hayn۔ry aykt ajzaaa main aywnt hayndalngh ki msaalwn main btn klks ko snbhalnay kay liye aan klyk ka astamal ، un pt tbdylywn ko snbhalnay kay liye aan chynj ، aur farm ki ghzaarshat ko snbhalnay kay liye awnsmyt shaml hayn۔

Question: rd aml main klydy shaara denay ka mksad kya haay؟yha kyon zurwry haay؟
Answer:
klydy shaara denay wala rd aml main ayk khasa wsaf hay jo is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh fharst main kon sy ashyaa tbdyl ki hogi hain ، shaml ki hogi hain ، ya 123456 ko hata diya gaya haay۔jb rd aml main anasar ki fharst pysh karty ho tou ، hr ansar 123456 kay liye ayk anwkhy klyd tfwyzu karna bohat zurwry haay۔klydy prwp ko dakhly tawr par mfahamt kay mkasad kay liye rd aml kay zaryaha astamal kya jata hay aur isy ajzaaa 123456 tak nahin phanchaya jata haay۔ klydy shaara denay main aham hay kywnkha is sy lst 123456 kay andr anasar ko mwsar andaza main snbhalnay aur ap dayt karnay main rd aml zaahar karnay main mdd mlty haay۔jb kesi fharst ko ap dayt kya jata hay tou ، rd aml ka tayn karnay kay liye klydy shaara astamal hawta hay keh kon sy anasar ko tbdyl kya gaya hay ، shaml kya gaya hay ، ya 123456 ko hata diya gaya haay۔klydy shaaray kay baghair ، rd aml ko pori fharst ko dwbarha pysh karna hoga ، jo sst aur ghair mwsar 123456 hawskta haay۔ is ki msaal hay keh REACT123456 main anasar ki fharst main klydy shaara denay ki ayk msaal haay: fnkshn lst () {kanst aaitmza = ['aypl '،' kylay '،' awrnj '] ؛wapsy (

Answer: twsayk aur ajazat kesi bhi wyb ayply kyshn kay aham phalw hain ، bshmwl ry aykt ayply kyshnza۔rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main twsayk aur ajazat ko snbhalnay kay liye yahan kuch aam nktaha nzar hayn: twkn par mbny twsayk: twkn par mbny twsayk ry aykt ayply kyshnza 1234 main twsayk ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk mkbwl nktaha nzar haay۔as nktaha nzar main ، srwr saiyda par ayk twkn tyar kya jata hay aur klaint saiyda par bhyja jata hay ، jo is kay bad bad ki drkhwastwn ki twsayk karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔twkn ko mkamy astwryj ya kwkyza main zakhyrha kya jaskta hay aur hr drkhwast kay sath srwr 1234.oauth aur awpn aai day ko bhyja jaskta haay: OAUTH aur awpn aai day twsayk kay prwtwkwl hain jo saarfyn ko ghwghl ، fys bk ، ya twytr 154 jesay thrda party fraham knndghan ka astamal karty hoey twsayk karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔yha prwtwkwl wsya pymanay par ry aykt ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain aur tsadyk ko snbhalnay ka ayk mhafwza aur aasan tarykha fraham karty hayn۔as nktaha nzar main ayk srwr saiyda API bnana shaml hay jo twsayk aur ajazat ko snbhalta hay aur isy ry aykt ayply kyshn 136 kay sath mrbwta krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main twsayk aur ajazat sy nmtna mkhtlf nktaha nzar jesay twkn par mbny twsayk ، OAUTH aur awpn aai day ، aur astamal kya jaskta haay۔apny mrzuy kay mtaabk twsayk.yha nktaha nzar rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main twsayk aur ajazat ko snbhalnay ka ayk mhafwza aur aasan tarykha fraham karty hayn۔

Question: rd aml main srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔ays ays aar kay fwaid kya hayn؟
Answer: rd aml main srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) srwr par wyb safhaat pysh karnay aur kham jawa askrpt bhyjnay aur klaint ko safhaha 1234 ryndar karnay ki bjaiay klaint ko pehlay sy pysh krdha HTML bhyjnay kay liye ayk tknyk haay۔jb koi saarf kesi safhaay ki drkhwast krta hay tou ، srwr HTML mwad tyar krta hay aur isy braha rast saarf kay braؤzar ko bhyjta hay ، jo jawa askrpt ko ayghzayktw 1234 ka antzaar kyay baghair isy fwry tawr par zaahar krskta haay۔ays ays aar ry aykt ayply kyshnza 1234 ki karkrdghy ، rsai aur slamty ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakta haay۔ yahan ry aykt ayply kyshnza 512364 main ays ays aar kay kuch fwaid hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: ays ays aar abtdaiy safhaay ko kam karnay aur kam karnay main wkt ko kam karnay main ry aykt ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔jawa askrpt ki mkdar js ko klaint 512364 kay zaryaha daaؤn lwda aur is par aml draamd karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ IMPROVED SEO: ays ays aar pehlay sy pysh krdha HTML mwad fraham krkay ry aykt ayply kyshn ki srch anjn aaptymaizayshn (SEO) ko bhatr bna sakta hay jsay srch anjn 512364.mrwpyda kay zaryaha ryngh aur trtyb diya jaskta haay۔kabl rsa: ays ays aar pehlay sy fraham krdha HTML mwad fraham krkay ry aykt ayply kyshn ki rsai ko bhatr bna sakta hay jsay askryn rydarza aur dyghr maawn tyknalwjyza 512364 kay zaryaha prah saktay hayn۔ amprwda sykywrty: ays ays aar kras sait kay khtaray ko kam krkay ry aykt ayply kyshn ki hafazat ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔askrptngh (ayks ays ays) hamlwn aur dyghr sykywrty kay khtarat 512364.in ka khlasaha ، srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) srwr par wyb safhaat pysh karnay aur klaint ko pehlay sy pysh krdha HTML bhyjnay kay liye ayk tknyk haay۔ays ays aar rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ، rsai aur slamty ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakta haay۔ays ays aar kay fwaid main bhatr karkrdghy ، bhatr SEO ، bhatr rsaiy ، aur bhatr sykywrty shaml hayn۔

Question: aghla kya haay؟yha rd aml ki trky ko kis tarah brahata haay؟aghly daat jay ays khsawsayat ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: aghla daat jay ays ayk awpn swrs ry aykt frym wrk hay jo tyza rftar wyb ayply kyshnza 1234 bnanay kay liye bldangh blaks mhaya krta haay۔yha tkhlyk kya gaya tha aur isy wrsl nay brkrar rakha haay۔aghla daat jay ays sakht aur twlza ki frahamy kay zaryaha rd aml ki salahaytwn main azuafha krta hay jo karkrdghy ، SEO aur rsai 45 ko bhatr bnatay hayn۔aghla daat jay ays srwr saiyda ryndarda (ays ays aar) ayply kyshnza ya ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye mwzawn hay jo jamd jnryshn aur nwda daat jay ays srwr saiyda ryndarngh 4 ko ykja karty hayn۔ aghla ki kuch khsawsayat hayn۔ jay ays 36: srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar): aghla daat jay ayssrwr saiyda ryndarngh kay liye blt un spwrt fraham krta hay ، jo ayk ry aykt ayply kyshn 36 ki karkrdghy aur SEO ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakta haay۔ aatwmytk kwda aspltngh: aghla. jay ays khud bkhwd kwda ko chhwtay hasawn main tksym krta hay js ki talb par bhry hawskty hay ، js sy abtdaiy bwjh kay wkt ko kam kya jaskta haay۔ayk ry aykt ayply kyshn 236. astytk sait jnryshn: aghla daat jay ays jamd saitwn ko pyda karnay kay liye maawnt fraham krta hay ، jo ayk ry aykt ayply kyshn 36 ki karkrdghy aur slamty ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔ aay py aai rwts: aghla daat jay ays API kay rastwn ki tshkyl kay liye blt un spwrt fraham krta hay ، js sy yeh aasan hawjata haay۔ayk ry aykt ayply kyshn 36.css aur SASS spwrt kay liye srwr lys APIs bnanay kay liay: aghla daat jay ays sy ays ays aur ays aay ays ays kay liye blt un spwrt fraham krta hay ، js sy ry aykt ayply kyshn 36.in ka khlasaha karna aasan hawjata haay۔tyza wyb ayply kyshnza bnanay kay liye bldangh blaks fraham krta haay۔aghla daat jay ays sakht aur twlza ki frahamy kay zaryaha rd aml ki salahaytwn main azuafha krta hay jo karkrdghy ، SEO aur rsai ko bhatr bnatay hayn۔aghla daat jay ays srwr saiyda ryndarngh ، khwdkar kwda aspltngh ، jamd sait ki nsl ، API rwts ، aur sy ays ays aur sas spwrt kay liye blt un spwrt fraham krta haay۔

Question: ry aykt main kwda tksym karnay kay tsawr aur bndal saiza ko bhatr bnanay kay l its is kay fwaid ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: kwda aspltngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo kesi ayply kyshn kay bndal saiza ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati hay takha ayply kyshn kay jawa askrpt ko chhwtay ، madaywlr bndalwn main twra dy js ko cunks123456 kaha jata haay۔an hasawn ko talb par bhry jaskty hay ، jo abtdaiy bwjh taim 123456 ko kam krkay drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakti haay۔kwda tksym karnay sy dawylprza ko sirf kwda lwda karnay ki ajazat mlty hay js ki zurwrt kesi khasa safhaay ya khsawsayt kay liye hawty hay ، bjaiay is kay keh ayk bar 123456 par pori ayply kyshn ko lwda kya jaskay۔ yahan ry aykt ayply kyshnza 156 main kwda tksym karnay kay kuch fwaid hayn: tyzay sy lwdangh kay awkat: kwda tksym karnay sy abtdaiy lwdangh ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔jawa askrpt ki mkdar ko kam krkay ayk rd aml ki drkhwast ka wkt js ko klaint 156 kay zaryaha daaؤn lwda aur is par aml draamd karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ pysh krdha karkrdghy: kwda tksym karnay sy kwda ki mkdar ko kam krkay ry aykt ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta hay js kay zaryaha bhry hui aur is par aml draamd karnay ki zurwrt haay۔klaint 156. bytr saarf ka tjrbha: kwda tksym karna kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn 156 kay sath bwjh aur bat chyt karnay main wkt ko kam krkay bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krskta haay۔ yahan REACT1356 main kwda tksym karnay wali khsawsayat ki kuch msaalyn hayn: mthark draamdat dawylprza ko madaywlza ko lwda karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔mtaalbha par ، jo ayk ry aykt ayply kyshn 1356 kay abtdaiy bwjh kay wkt ko nmayan tawr par kam krskta haay۔kwda tksym karnay main ayply kyshn 156 kay ajzaaa ki bnyad par kwda ko tkrawn main tksym karna shaml haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، kwda aspltngh ayk aysy tknyk hay js main drkhwast kay jawa askrpt ko chhwtay ، madaywlr bndalwn main tkrawn ko twra kar kesi ayply kyshn kay bndal saiza ko bhatr bnanay kay liye rd aml main astamal kya jata haay۔kwda tksym karnay sy abtdaiy bwjh kay wkt ko kam krkay aur klaint kay zaryaha lwda aur is par aml draamd karnay ki zurwrt waly kwda ki mkdar ko kam krkay ry aykt ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔rd aml main kwda tksym karnay ki khsawsayat main mthark draamdat ، rwt par mbny kwda aspltngh ، aur jzaw par mbny kwda tksym karna shaml hayn۔

Question: aap rd aml main farm ki twsayk ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟twsayk ki mkhtlf tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: farm ki twsayk rd aml main antrayktw wyb ayply kyshnza ki tamyr ka ayk lazmi phalw haay۔rd aml main farm ki twsayk sy nmtnay kay liye yahan kuch aam tknykyn hayn: kntrwl shuda ajzaaa: kntrwl shuda ajzaaa rd aml kay ajzaaa hain jo ayk farm ansar pysh karty hain aur jab saarf farm 123 kay sath bat chyt karty hain tou jzaw ki haalt ko ap dayt krkay is ki haalt ka antzaam karty hayn۔yha nktaha nzar dawylprza ko farm kay aadad wa shmar ki twsayk karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jesay hi saarf is main dakhl hawta hay aur ryil taim 123 main saarf ko raiay fraham krta haay۔ thryda party laibryrywn: ry aykt main farm ki twsayk sy nmtnay kay liye kiy thrda party laibryryan dstyab hain ، jesay farmk ، ywp، aur rd aml hak farm 4526۔yha laibryryan farm dayta ki twsayk karnay aur farm ko hayndal karnay kay l tools twlza aur afadyt ka ayk syt fraham krty hayn۔as nktaha nzar main farm kay aadad wa shmar ki twsayk karnay aur saarf ko tasarat fraham karnay kay liye kstm kwda lkhna shaml haay۔yha tknyk farm kay aadad wa shmar ki twsayk karnay aur saarf ko hakyky wkt main raiay fraham karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty hay ، js sy antrayktw wyb ayply kyshnza ko rd aml main bnana aasan hawjata haay۔

Question: rd aml yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh karkrdghy ko kis tarah bhatr bna sakta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt mymwraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mhanghay fnkshn kalwn kay ntaij kychngh krkay aur un kyshda ntaij ko waps krkay jab un ki zurwrt hawty hay tou un ki kwch kay ntaij ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yaddashtwn ko rd aml main ajzaaa ki pysh ksh ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jo un ajzaaa kay ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ko rwktay hain jo 123456 main tbdyl nahin hoey hayn۔React.memo () ayk aaly aardar ka jzaw hay jo React123456 main fnkshnl ajzaaa ko yaddasht karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ yahan React mymwizayshn 123456 kay kuch fwaid hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: rd aml ki yaddasht ghnty ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakti haay۔as ko anjam denay ki zurwrt hay aur dwbarha ryndarza ki tadad js par amldraamd karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ mymwry ka astamal kam kya gaya haay: rd aml mymwizayshn ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay waly ajzaaa ko rwknay kay zaryaha rd aml ki drkhwast kay zaryaha astamal hony wali mymwry ki mkdar ko kam krskty haay۔tjrbha: ry aykt mymwraizayshn ayk ry aykt ayply kyshn 123456 kay sath bwjh aur bat chyt karnay kay liye wkt ko kam krkay saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham krskty haay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml mymwizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mhanghay fnkshn kalwn kay ntaij ko haasal krkay ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati hay awran ajzaaa kay ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ko rwkna jo tbdyl nahin hoey hayn۔React.memo () ayk aaly aardar ka jzaw hay jo rd aml main fnkshnl ajzaaa ko yaddasht karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔rd aml ki yaddasht kay fwaid main bhatr karkrdghy ، mymwry ka astamal kam ، aur bhatr saarf ka tjrbha shaml haay۔

Question: rd aml faibr kya haay؟as sy rd aml main ryndarngh kay aml ko kis tarah bhatr bnaya jata haay؟
Answer: ry aykt faibr ayk rd aml main ayk nya aur bhatr ryndarngh alghwrthm hay jo rd aml 1612345 main mtaarf kraya gaya tha۔ yeh ry aykt kay bnyady alghwrthm ki ayk asalaha hay js ka mksad bohat sari pryshanywn ko hal karna hay jo asal alghwrthm 12345 kay sath samnay aya haay۔ry aykt faibr ka hadf ayk zayada taaktwr aur lchkdar msaalhaha fraham karna hay jo bhatr karkrdghy aur zayada kshsh kay tjrbha karnay kay liye ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko kabl bnata haay۔aml ko chhwtay ، zayada kabl antzaam hasawn main twra diya jaye ga ، js sy yeh zayada mwsar aur lchkdar 12345 haay۔ ankrymntl ryndarngh: ry aykt faibr main azuafy ryndarngh shaml hawty hay ، jo ryndarngh kay aml ko tkrawn main tksym karnay aur mtadd frymwn main phylanay ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy is ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔ayply kyshn 12345.mkwr dawylpr twlza: ry aykt faibr main bhatr dawylpr twlza shaml hain jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza 12345.12345 ko daybgh aur un ko bhatr bnana aasan bnatay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، ry aykt faibr ayk nya aur lchkdar salha kar fraham krta hay jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko kabl bnata hay jo is kay kabl bnata haay۔bhatr karkrdghy aur zayada mshghwl saarf kay tjrbay ki frahamy kryn۔ry aykt faibr kay fwaid main ghair mtzalzal ryndarngh ، azuafy ryndarngh ، aur bhatr dawylpr twlza shaml hayn۔

Question: aap srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshn main rwtngh ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshn main rwtngh ko hayndal karna mkhtlf tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔yhaan kuch aam nktaha nzar hayn: rd aml rwtr: ry aykt rwtr ayk mshhawr laibryry hay jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza main klaint saiyda rwtngh kay liye astamal hawty haay۔taham ، yeh ayplykyshn 123 ki karkrdghy ko brahanay kay liye srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔ays ays aar ayk aysy tknyk hay jo klaint ko bhyjnay sy pehlay srwr par wyb safhaat ko pysh karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha tarykha mtadd fwaid pysh krta hay ، js main abtdaiy bwjh kay awkat ، bhatr SEO ، aur zayada sy zayada rsai 123 shaml hayn۔ays ays aar kay liye ry aykt rwtr ko astamal karnay kay l developers ، dawylprza ko aanay wali drkhwastwn par karrwaiy karnay aur mtalkha rd aml kay ajzaaa 123 ko pysh karnay kay liye apnay srwr ko tshkyl denay ki zurwrt haay۔ srwr saiyda rwtngh srwr saiyda ryndarda rypykt ayply kyshn 345 main rastwn sy nmtnay kay liye ayk aur nktaha nzar haay۔srwr saiyda rwtngh kay sath ، saarf ayk aysay lnk par klyk krta hay jo srwr sy niay safhaay ya niay dayta ki drkhwast krta hay ، aur phir nya dayta ya dstawyza saarf 345 ko pysh kya jata haay۔srwr saiyda rwtngh ry aykt raؤtr ka hasaha nahin hay lekin phir bhi rwts ko snbhalnay ki sab sy aam shkl haay۔ khlasaha main ، srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshn main rwtngh ko snbhalna mkhtlf tknykwn jesay ry aykt rwtr aur srwr saiyda rwtngh ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ry aykt rwtr ayk mshhawr laibryry hay jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza main klaint saiyda rwtngh kay liye astamal hawty hay ، lekin is ko srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta hay takha drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko brahaya jaskay۔srwr saiyda rwtngh srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshn main rastwn ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk aur nktaha nzar haay۔

Question: saarf kay tjrbay kay l reac rd aml smwrty mwda aur is kay fwaid kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt smwrty wzua ry aykt 18 main mtaarf krwaiy hogi khsawsayat ka ayk mjmwaha hay jo ayply kyshnza ko rd aml main rhanay main mdd krta hay aur saarf kay aalay aur nyt wrk ki rftar ki salahaytwn main 12345 ko aasany sy aydajst karnay main mdd krta haay۔ham aahanghy wzua ko ghair mtzalzal ryndarngh ki hayndalngh ko bhatr bnanay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، jo saarf ka bhatr tjrbha 2 bnata haay۔as sy rd aml ko chhwtay aur trjyhay tkrawn main twranay ki ajazat mlty hay jsay faibr nwdas kehty hain ، jo is kay bad trjyhay 3 ki bnyad par shydawl hawtay hayn۔yhaan rd aml kay smwrnt mwda kay kuch fwaid hayn: bhatr saarf ka tjrbha: rd aml smwrty mwda antrfys ko pysh karnay ki ajazat dy kar ry aykt ayply kyshn kay saarf kay tjrbay ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakta hay jabky dayta ki bazayaft main pyshrft 2345 main haay۔chhwtay hasawn main ajzaaa ki pysh ksh kay zaryaha ayk rd aml ki drkhwast ki ، jo mtadd frymwn 12345 par phylaiy jaskty haay۔ jwaby rdaml: rdaml kay sath mlhakha mwda saarf antrfys ko ryil taim main ap dayt karnay ki ajazat dy kar rd aml ki drkhwast ki rdaml ko bhatr bna sakta hay kywnkha dayta 12345 haay۔. khlasaha main ، ry aykt smwrnt mwda ry aykt 18 main pysh ki janay wali khsawsayat ka ayk mjmwaha hay jo ayply kyshnza ko rd aml main rhanay main mdd krta hay aur saarf kay aalay aur nyt wrk ki rftar ki salahaytwn ko aasany sy aydajst karnay main mdd krta haay۔rd aml kay smwrty wzua kay fwaid main bhatr saarf ka tjrbha ، tyza rftar ryndarngh ، aur bhatr rdaml shaml haay۔

Question: ry aykt haks kay kwaad aur bhatryn aml kya hayn؟aam nksaanat aur un sy bchnay kay tarykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ryasty antzaam kay l reac ry aykt haks ka astamal karty wkt aam nksaanat aur aynty pytrn sy bchnay kay liye ry aykt haks kay kwaad aur bhatryn tarykwn par aml karna zurwry haay۔yhaan kuch aam nksaanat hain aur un sy kesay bchna haay: achhy bnyad kay baghair shrwa krna: ry aykt haks kay astamal sy pehlay ، yeh zurwry hay keh rd aml kay bnyady asawlwn ، jesay ajzaaa laif saiykl ، ryast ، aur prps 1 ki achhy tfhaym haasal ki jaiay۔ry aykt haks dstawyzaat ko prahna aur smjhna bhi zurwry haay۔as tarah kay haalat sy ghryza karnay sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh haks ko hr bar sahayha trtyb main kaha jata haay۔ ajzaaa 23. basy haalt ka astamal karty hawiay: basy ryast is wkt hawty hay jab koi jzaw frswdha ryast kay aadad wa shmar ka astamal krta hay ، js ki wjha sy ghair mtwka slwk 3 hawta haay۔basy haalt sy bchnay kay l state ، jab zurwry ho tou ryast ko ap dayt karnay kay liye ywzafykt hak ka astamal kryn۔ basy bndsh ko tyar krna: basy bndyan is wkt hawty hain jab koi jzaw kal byk fnkshn 3 main prany prwps ya ryasty dayta astamal krta haay۔basy band hony sy bchnay kay l function ، fnkshn ko yaddasht karnay kay l us yw ays ay sy ayl byk hak ka astamal karain aur yeh ykyny bnaiyn keh jab zurwry ho tou woh tazaha kary krta haay۔anfrastrkchr ko saaf kya jana chahaiay jab jzaw main ghair mnkwlha 3. smry ، ry aykt haks kay kwaad aur bhatryn tarykwn par aml karna zurwry hay jab ryast kay antzaam kay liye rd aml ka astamal karty wkt aam nksaanat aur aynty pytrn sy bchnay kay l. is par aml karna zurwry haay۔aam nksaanat main achhy faؤndayshn kay baghair shrwa karna ، haks kay dawt namay kay aardar ko tbdyl karna ، basy ryast ka astamal karna ، basy bndyan pyda karna ، aur anfrastrkchr kay liye ryast ka astamal shaml hayn۔an nksaanat sy bchnay kay l reac ، yeh zurwry hay keh ry aykt haks dstawyzaat ko prahyn aur smjhyn ، ywzafykt aur yw ays ay sy ayl byk haks ka astamal karain ، aur anfrastrkchr kay mkasad kay liye ryast ko astamal karnay sy ghryza kryn۔

Question: aap braay pymanay par rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main astyt mynjmnt ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟ryasty antzaamyha ki mkhtlf laibryrywn aur un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: astyt mynjmnt braay pymanay par rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki tamyr ka ayk aham phalw haay۔yhaan kuch aam astyt mynjmnt laibryryan aur un kay astamal hayn: ry aykt ki blt un astyt mynjmnt: ry aykt ayk blt un astyt mynjmnt sstm mhaya krta hay jo dawylprza ko byrwny laibryry 12 ka astamal kyay baghair kesi jzaw ki haalt ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha nktaha nzar chhwtay sy drmyanay drjay kay ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn hay js kay liye pychydha ryasty antzaam ki zurwrt nahin haay۔yha nktaha nzar chhwtay sy drmyanay drjay kay ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn hay js kay liye sadha ryasty antzaam ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ rydawks: rydawks ry aykt kay liye ayk mkbwl astyt mynjmnt laibryry hay jo ayply kyshn 1342 ki haalt ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk mrkzay astwr mhaya krty haay۔rydaks braay pymanay par ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn hay js main ryast kay pychydha antzaam aur dayta flw ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ aym aw by ayks: aym aw by ayks ry aykt kay liye ayk aur ryasty antzaamyha laibryry hay jo ayply kyshn 342 ki haalt ka antzaam karnay ka ayk aasan aur twsya pzayr tarykha fraham krty haay۔MOBX braay pymanay par ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn hay js main ryasty antzaamyha aur dayta kay pychydha ko pychydha drkar hawta haay۔ rykwiyl: bazayaft ayk ryasty antzaamyha laibryry hay jo rd aml kay liye hay jo fys bk 1 kay zaryaha tyar kya gaya tha۔yha braay pymanay par ayply kyshnza ko snbhalnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay aur pychydha astyt 1 kay nzam wa nsk ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، braay pymanay par ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryasty antzaam ko snbhalna mkhtlf laibryrywn jesay ry aykt ki blt un astyt mynjmnt ، syak wa sbak sy mtalk API ، rydaks ، mwbks ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔، aur pychhay hatna۔laibryry ka antkhab drkhwast ki pychydghy aur dayta flw ki zurwryat par mnhasar haay۔astyt mynjmnt laibryrywn ka astamal karty wkt bhatryn tarykwn par aml karna aur mshtrkha nksaanat sy bchna zurwry hay keh is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye keh drkhwast twsya pzayr ، brkrar rkhnay wala ، aur prfarmns haay۔

Question: sst lwdangh aur dayta bazayaft kay l reac rd aml ki mataly aur is kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt sspns ayk khsawsayt hay js main rd aml 16.6 main mtaarf kraya gaya hay jo dawylprza ko kuch kwda kay bwjh kay antzaar main aur antzaar kay doran kesi kwda ko lwda karnay aur aalanyha tawr par ayk lwdangh ryast ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔sspns ko sst lwdangh aur dayta bazayaft kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js sy dayta 1423 ki bray mkdar main pychydha ayply kyshnza ka antzaam karna aasan hawjata haay۔ry aykt sspns ko astamal karnay kay kuch tarykay yeh hayn: sst lwdangh: rd aml ki mataly ka astamal sst bwjh kay ajzaaa kay liye kya jaskta hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh ajzaaa sirf is wkt bhry hawtay hain jab un ki zurwrt hawty haay۔as nktaha nzar sy kwda ki mkdar ko kam krkay rd aml ki drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bnaya jaskta hay js ko abtdaiy tawr par lwda karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ dayta bazayaft: rd aml ki drkhwast ko kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn 1423 main dayta lanay ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔sspns dawylprza ko aadad wa shmar kay bazayaft kay antzaar main ayk lwdangh ryast ki aalan karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jo ayply kyshn kay saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔ ry aykt sspns kay astamal kay l some kuch bhatryn aml hayn: kwda tksym kay sath is ka astamal kryn: jab astamal kya jaye tou is kay sath astamal kya jaye jab astamal kya jaye tou is kay sath astamal kya jaiay۔kwda aspltngh ، jo dawylprza ko kwda ko chhwtay hasawn main tksym karnay ki ajazat dyta hay js ko mtaalbha 13 par bhry jaskty haay۔ isy dyghr laibryrywn kay sath astamal kryn: rd aml ki drkhwast ko bhatr tarykay sy astamal kya jaskta hay jesay ry aykt rwtr aur rydawks ko ry aykt ayply kyshn 1423 ki ryast aur rwtngh ka antzaam kya jaskta haay۔. isy ahatyata kay sath astamal kryn: rd aml sspns ab bhi ayk tjrbaty khsawsayt hay ، aur dawylprza ko ahatyata kay sath astamal karna chahaiay aur tazaha trien dstawyzaat aur bhatryn tarykwn 1423 par aml karna chahaiay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml sspns ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko ghair mtzalzal aapryshnwn ko snbhalnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔antzaar kay doran inhain kuch kwda kay bwjh kay liye antzaar karnay aur aalanyha tawr par lwdangh ryast ki wzuahat karnay dyn۔rd aml ki mataly ko sst lwdangh aur dayta lanay kay l used astamal kya jaskta hay ، js sy bray mkdar main dayta kay sath pychydha ayply kyshnza ka antzaam karna aasan hawjata haay۔ry aykt sspns ko astamal karnay kay bhatryn tarykwn main kwda tksym kay sath astamal karna ، isy dyghr laibryrywn kay sath astamal karna ، aur ahatyata kay sath astamal karna shaml haay۔

Question: aabaiy rd aml kya haay؟yha wyb dawylpmnt kay rd aml sy kesay mkhtlf haay؟
Answer: ry aykt aabaiy ayk kras plyt farm mwbail frym wrk hay jo mnfrd wyb saitwn aur ayply kyshnza 123456 ki tamyr kay liye REACTJs ka astamal krta haay۔yha wyb dawylpmnt kay liye wyb dawylpmnt kay liye rd aml sy mkhtlf haay: wyb dawylpmnt kay liye rd aml: wyb ayplykyshnza kay liye saarf antrfys bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay HTML ، CSS ، aur jawa askrpt ko wyb braؤzar aarkyt aabaiy par antrayktw wyb ayply kyshn rnza bnanay kay liay: ayply kyshnza bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo chlanay waly ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔IOS aur Android aalat dono par mkamy UI ajzaaa aur APIs mwbail par mwbail aypsrns tyar karnay kay liye mwbail daywaisshyr par mwbail daywsyshyr par mwbail dawylpmnt 123456 kay liye rd aml ka astamal karnay kay kuch fwaid hayn: kras plyt farm dawylpmnt: ry aykt aabaiy dawylprza ko aysy ayply kyshnza bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay jo aai aw ays aur ayndarwiyda dono aalat par chltay hayn۔، trky kay wkt aur kymtwn ko kam krna۔trkyaty wkt aur laghtwn ka khlasaha yeh hay keh ، ry aykt aabaiy ayk kras plyt farm mwbail frym wrk hay jo mnfrd wyb saitwn aur ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye REACTJs ka astamal krta haay۔yha js plyt farm par chlta hay aur is kay astamal krdha ajzaaa kay lhaaza sy wyb dawylpmnt kay liye rd aml sy mkhtlf haay۔ry aykt aabaiy fwaid fraham krta hay jesay kras plyt farm dawylpmnt ، aabaiy karkrdghy ، aur kwda dwbarha astamal ki salahayt۔

Question: rd aml kay sath srwr lys ayply kyshnza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔aap srwr lys plyt farmza main ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko kis tarah taynat karty hayn؟
Answer: rd aml kay sath srwr lys ayply kyshnza srshar srwrza ya anfrastrkchr ki zurwrt kay baghair ayply kyshnza ki tamyr aur taynat karnay ka ayk tarykha haay۔as kay bjaiay ، ayply kyshn ko srwr lys plyt farm main taynat kya gaya hay ، jo ayply kyshn kay bnyady dahanchay aur askylngh ka antzaam krta haay۔srwr lys plyt farmza main ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko taynat karnay kay liye kuch akdamat yeh hayn: srwr lys plyt farm ka antkhab kryn: bohat sary srwr lys plyt farm dstyab hain ، jesay AWS lymbdaa ، ghwghl klaؤda fnkshn ، aur maiykrwsaft Azure fnkshn 123۔ayk aysa plyt farm mntkhb karain jo aap ki zurwryat aur bjt kay mtaabk haw۔ srwr lys mahawl ko trtyb dyn: zurwry twlza anstal krkay aur plyt farm 1423 ko tshkyl dy kar srwr lys mahawl ko trtyb dyn۔as main srwr lys prwjykt trtyb dena ، srwr lys fnkshn bnanay ، aur srwr lys mahawl ko tshkyl dena shaml hawskta haay۔ ry aykt ayply kyshn ko blda aur taynat kryn: ry aykt ayply kyshn bnaiyn aur isy srwr lys plyt farm 1445263 par taynat kryn۔as main ayplykyshn ki tamyr aur tay .n kay l the srwr lys frym wrk ، AWS ymplyfaingh ، ya ays ays ty jesay twlza ka astamal shaml hawskta haay۔ yahan srwr lys ayply kyshnza kay astamal kay kuch fwaid hayn: anfrastrkchr kay akhrajat main kmy: srwr lys ayply kyshnza anfrastrkchr kay akhrajat ko nmayan tawr par kam krsktay hain kywnkha is ki zurwrt nahin hay kywnkha is ki koi zurwrt nahin haay۔srshar srwrza ya anfrastrkchr 123 kay liay۔ askylyblty: srwr lys plyt farm daymanda ki bnyad par khud bkhwd ayply kyshn ko askyl krsktay hain ، js sy tryfk aspaiks 123 ko snbhalna aasan hawjata haay۔ faistr ki taynaty: srwr lys ayply kyshnza ko tyzay sy taynat kya jaskta hay kywnkha anfrastrkchr ya srwrza 123.in smry ka antzaam karnay ki zurwrt nahin hay ،rd aml kay sath srwr lys ayply kyshnza srshar srwrza ya anfrastrkchr ki zurwrt kay baghair ayply kyshnza ki tamyr aur taynat karnay ka ayk tarykha haay۔srwr lys plyt farmza main ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko taynat karnay kay liye ، dawylprza ko srwr lys plyt farm ka antkhab karnay ، srwr lys mahawl ko trtyb denay ، aur ry aykt ayply kyshn ko bnanay aur taynat karnay ki zurwrt haay۔rd aml kay sath srwr lys ayply kyshnza ko astamal karnay kay fwaid main anfrastrkchr kay kam akhrajat ، askyl ayblty ، aur tyza tr taynaty shaml hayn۔ kwdabrst 2 aynwrda klaؤda 3 ays aywr lys 4 awpnr play 5 ays ays ty 66youtube shaml hayn۔

Question: aap rd aml main mthark tsaawyr ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟mkhtlf harkt pzayry laibryrywn aur nktaha nzar ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt ry aykt ayply kyshnza main mthark tsaawyr ko snbhalnay kay l several kiy harkt pzayry laibryryan aur nktaha nzar fraham krta haay۔yhaan kuch aam harkt pzayry laibryryan aur nktaha nzar hayn: rd aml bhaar: ry aykt asprngh ayk mshhawr harkt pzayry laibryry hay jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza 12345 main mthark tsaawyr ko snbhalnay ka ayk aasan aur lchkdar tarykha fraham krty haay۔yha hamwar aur kdrty mthark tsaawyr bnanay kay liye tabyayat par mbny nktaha nzar ka astamal krta haay۔ frymr mwshn: frymr mwshn ayk aur mshhawr harkt pzayry laibryry hay jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza 12345 main mthark tsaawyr ko snbhalnay ka ayk aasan aur bdyhay tarykha fraham krty haay۔yha mthark tsaawyr bnanay kay liye ayk aalanyha nhaw ka astamal krta hay aur mthark aksam ki wsya rynj ki hamayt krta haay۔ aar aay sy ty tranzayshn ghrwp: ry aykt tranzayshn ghrwp harkt pzayry kay liye ayk nchly staha ka API hay jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza 12345 main kstm tranzayshn bnanay kay liye haks mhaya krta haay۔yha un dawylprza kay liye ayk achha aapshn hay jo harkt pzayry kay aml par zayada kntrwl chahti hayn۔ ry aay sy ty sadha anymyt: ry aykt sadha aynymyt ayk halka phlka harkt pzayry laibryry hay jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza 6 main mthark tsaawyr bnanay kay liye ayk aalanyha API fraham krty haay۔yha astamal karna aasan hay aur mthark tsaawyr ki wzuahat kay l a ayk sadha nhaw fraham krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main mthark tsaawyr ko snbhalnay sy mkhtlf laibryrywn aur nktaha nzar jesay ry aykt asprngh ، frymr mwshn ، rd aml mntkly ghrwp ، aur sadha aynymyt ka rd aml zaahar kya jaskta haay۔yha laibryryan hamwar aur kdrty mthark tsaawyr bnanay ، mthark aksam ki ayk wsya rynj ki taiyd karnay ، aur mthark tsaawyr ki wzuahat kay liye ayk aalanyha trkyb fraham karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty hayn۔

Question: rd aml ajzaaa ki tshkyl kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kwda kay dwbarha astamal ko kis tarah frwgh dyta haay۔
Answer: rd aml ajzaaa ki tshkyl ayk bnyady tsawr hay jo pychydha faalyt ko chhwtay ، mrkwza hasawn main twra kar kwda kay dwbarha astamal ko frwgh dyta hay jo smjhnay ، tyst karnay aur 123456 ko brkrar rkhnay main aasan haay۔yha dawylprza ko chhwtay ، khud sakhtha ajzaaa bnanay ki trghyb dyta hay jo braay aur zayada pychydha ajzaaa 4 bnanay kay liye mil saktay hayn۔yhaan rd aml ajzaaa ki tshkyl kay kuch fwaid hayn: madaywlryty main azuafha: rd aml jzaw ki tshkyl kesi ayply kyshn ko chhwtay ، dwbarha kabl astamal ajzaaa 123456 main twra kar madaywlryty ko frwgh dyty haay۔as nktaha nzar sy kwda ko smjhnay ، janch aur brkrar rkhnay main aasany pyda hawty haay۔ daybghngh: rd aml jzaw ki tshkyl daybghngh ko aasan bna dyty hay kywnkha hr jzaw saarf antrfys 23456 kay ayk mkhsawsa hasaay ko pysh karnay kay liye zamha dar haay۔as nktaha nzar sy kwda main msail ki nshandhay karna aur un ko thyk karna aasan hawjata haay۔ mazeed mwsar kwda ka dwbarha astamal: rd aml jzaw ki tshkyl kwda ko dwbarha astamal ko frwgh dyty hay js sy dawylprza ko ayply kyshn 123456 kay mkhtlf hasawn main ajzaaa ko dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat mil jati haay۔as nktaha nzar sy trkyaty wkt aur kymtwn ko kam kya jata haay۔ khlasaha yeh keh ajzaaa ki tshkyl ayk taaktwr twl hay jo dawylprza ko aasany kay sath pychydha ، madaywlr saarf antrfys bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔saarf kay antrfys ko chhwtay ، dwbarha astamal kay kabl ajzaaa main twra kar ، hum aysay dayzaain tshkyl dy saktay hain jo trmym aur twsya main aasan hawn۔ajzaaa ka madal daybghngh ko bhi aasan bna dyta hay ، kywnkha hr jzaw saarf antrfys kay ayk mkhsawsa hasaay ko pysh karnay kay liye zamha dar hawta haay۔ry aykt ajzaaa ki tshkyl kay fwaid main madaywlryty ، aasan daybghngh ، aur zayada mwsar kwda ka dwbarha astamal shaml hay ۔142trytyktyw 2 awwryly 3 day ay wy 4 dablyw py aur ry aykt 5 by aai ty ays aar sy 6 ayf aar sy aw day sy aay aym py

Question: rd aml kay dayzaain kay nmwnay kya hayn؟ry aykt ayply kyshnza main aam tawr par astamal shuda dayzaain nmwnwn ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt dayzaain kay nmwnay rd aml dawylprza kay zaryaha pysh aanay waly aam msail ko hal karnay kay liye saabt shuda tarykay hayn۔wha aam saft wyir dawylpmnt kay msail kay hal tymplyts hain jo ayply kyshnza par rd aml zaahar karnay kay liye dahanchha mhaya karty hain ، js sy inhain smjhnay ، janch aur brkrar rkhnay main aasany hawty haay۔ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kuch aam tawr par astamal shuda dayzaain kay nmwnay yeh hayn: aaly aardar kay ajzaaa (HOC): HOC ayk aaly drjay ki rd aml ka nmwnha hay jo kesi ayply kyshn 123 main jzaw ki mntak ko dwbarha astamal karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk aysa fnkshn hay jo ayk jzaw ko la jata hay aur azuafy faalyt kay sath ayk nya jza waps krta haay۔ ryndar prps: ryndar prps ayk aysa nmwnha hay jo dawylprza ko kesi fnkshn ko prwpy 1 kay tawr par pas krkay ajzaaa kay mabyn kwda shyir karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha ayk tarykha hay jo baghair HOCS.STATE REDUCER ka astamal kyay baghair ajzaaa kay mabyn kwda ko dwbarha astamal karnay ka ayk tarykha haay: astyt rydawzar ayk nmwnha hay jo kesi prwpy 1 kay tawr par rydawsr fnkshn ko pas krkay kesi jzaw ki haalt ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk jzaw main pychydha haalt ka antzaam karnay ka ayk tarykha haay۔yha dwbarha kabl astamal ajzaaa bnanay ka ayk tarykha hay jo pychydha saarf antrfys bnanay kay liye tshkyl diya jaskta haay۔ prwwydar pytrn: fraham knndha pytrn ayk aysa nmwnha hay jo ayk ry aykt ayply kyshn 4 main aalmy ryast ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk tarykha hay keh ajzaaa kay drkht ko prwps kay astamal kyay baghair dayta ko mntkl kryn۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، ry aykt dayzaain kay nmwnay aam saft wyir dawylpmnt kay msail kay hal tymplyts hain jo ayply kyshnza par rd aml zaahar karnay kay liye dahanchha mhaya karty hain ، js sy inhain smjhnay ، janch aur brkrar rkhnay main aasany hawty haay۔ry aykt ayply kyshnza main aam tawr par astamal shuda dayzaain kay nmwnwn main aaly aardar kay ajzaaa ، ryndar prps ، astyt rydawsr ، kmpaؤnda ajzaaa ، aur fraham knndha ka nmwnha shaml hayn۔yha nmwnay rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main kwda kay dwbarha astamal ، madaywlryty aur askyl ayblty ko frwgh dytay hayn۔

Question: rd aml main aap zumny asarat (jysay API kalza ya sbskrpshnza) ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟useefectect hak kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt main API kalza ya sbskrpshnza jesay zumny asarat ko hayndal karna ywzafykt hak ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔yw ays ay ayf ay sy ty hak ayk blt un ry aykt hak hay jo dawylprza ko fnkshnl ajzaaa 123456 kay andr zumny asarat ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha kesay kam krta haay: ywzafykt hak do pyramytrza ko kbwl krta haay: ayk kal byk fnkshn aur ayk akhtyary anhasaar srny۔ kal byk fnkshn main kwda hawta hay jo jzaw pysh karnay kay bad anjam dyta haay۔ anhasaar srny is mtghyr ki wzuahat krta hay jo USEEFECT ko tbdylywn kay liye manytr karna chahaiay۔aghr anhasaar srny main koi mtghyrat main tbdyly hay tou ، kal byk fnkshn ko dwbarha aml main laya jaye gha۔ yahan astamal karnay waly hak ko astamal karnay kay liye kuch bhatryn aml hayn: zumny asarat ko snbhalnay kay liye isy astamal kryn: USEEFECT hak API kalza jesay zumny asarat ko snbhalnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔ya sbskrpshn 123456. anhasaar ki wzuahat kryn: anhasaar saf main anhasaar ki wzuahat karain takha is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye keh asar sirf jab zurwry ho tou ، karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana aur aap ki ayply kyshn ki salmyt ko brkrar rkhna۔asar 356 kay bad۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh asar ko sahayha tarykay sy saaf kya jata hay jab ajzaaa kay anmaؤnts۔ smry main ، rd aml main zumny asarat ko snbhalnay sy ywzafykt hak ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔USEEFECT hak dawylprza ko fnkshnl ajzaaa kay andr zumny asarat ka antzaam karnay aur anhasaar ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh jab zurwry ho tou is ka asar sirf mthark haw۔useefect hak ko astamal karnay kay bhatryn tarykwn main zumny asarat ko snbhalnay ، anhasaar ki wzuahat karnay ، aur asar kay bad safaiy sthraiy kay liye astamal karnay main shaml hayn۔

Question: hum aahanghy kay mwda kay sath rd aml ki mataly kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur aadad wa shmar ki bazayaft aur ryndarngh kay l its is kay fwaid۔
Answer: hum aahanghy kay mwda kay sath rd aml ki mataly ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo ry aykt 18 main mtaarf kraiy hogi hay jo dawylprza ko ry aykt ayply kyshnza 12345 main ghair mtnasb dayta bazayaft aur ryndarngh ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha rd aml kay ajzaaa main lwdangh ryastwn kay antzaam ko aasan bnata hay aur ajzaaa ko rd aml kay sath bat chyt karnay ki ajazat dyta hay keh woh kuch aadad wa shmar kay mntzar hayn۔ham aahanghy kay mwda kay sath rd aml ki mataly kay kuch fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr saarf ka tjrbha: smwrty mwda kay sath rd aml ki mataly antrfys ko pysh karnay ki ajazat dy kar kesi rd aml ki drkhwast kay saarf kay tjrbay ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakti hay jabky dayta ki bazayaft main pyshrft haay۔smwrty mwda chhwtay hasawn main ajzaaa pysh krkay ry aykt ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta hay ، jo ayk sy zayada frymza 12345 par phyl sakta haay۔ jwaby rdaml: hum aahanghy mwda kay sath rd aml zaahar karnay sy saarf antrfys ko ap dayt karnay ki ajazat dy kar rd aml ki drkhwast ki rdaml ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ryil taim main chwnkha aadad wa shmar ko 12345 haasal kya jata haay۔ jab hum smwrty mwda kay sath rd aml ki mataly ka astamal kryn: jzaw ko <sspns> ajzaaa kay sath lpytyn۔ fal byk jza ko pysh karnay kay liye fyl byk kay jzaw ki wzuahat kryn۔fal byk byk ajzaaa sy pehlay takhyr ki pysh ksh ki jati haay۔ khlasaha main ، smwrnt mwda kay sath rd aml sspns ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo ry aykt 18 main mtaarf kraiy hogi hay jo dawylprza ko ghair mtzalzal dayta lanay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza main pysh karnay ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha rd aml kay ajzaaa main lwdangh ryastwn kay antzaam ko aasan bnata hay aur ajzaaa ko rd aml kay sath bat chyt karnay ki ajazat dyta hay keh woh kuch dayta haasal karnay kay mntzar hayn۔smwrty mwda kay sath rd aml ki mataly kay fwaid main saarf ka bhatr tjrbha ، tyza rftar pysh ksh ، aur bhatr rdaml shaml hayn۔ham aahanghy kay mwda kay sath rd aml ko astamal karnay kay liye ، jzaw ko <sspns> jzaw kay sath lpytyn ، fal byk byk jza ko pysh karnay kay liye byan karain jab aadad wa shmar ko jnm diya jarhaa hay ، aur fal byk byk jza ko pysh karnay sy pehlay takhyr ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ustransition hak ka astamal kryn۔

Question: rd aml ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki tknyk kya hayn؟ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay aur bndal kay saiza ko kam karnay kay tarykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml ki karkrdghy ki asalaha ki tknyk zurwry hay keh is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye keh rd aml ki ayply kyshnza tyza ، zamha dar aur mwsar hawn۔ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay aur bndal kay saiza ko kam karnay kay liye kuch tarykay yeh hayn: ryndarngh ko bhatr bnana: rd aml ka astamal kryn۔ mymw ya pywrkmpynt: ry aykt.mymw aur pywrkmpynt ghair zurwry ry ryndarza 123456 ki tadad ko kam krkay ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay kay do tarykay hayn۔wha pchhlay aur mwjwdha prps aur ryast ka mwazanha krkay kam karty hain takha yeh malwm kya jaskay keh aya dwbarha pysh karnay wala zurwry haay۔ astamal kryn۔yha pchhlay aur mwjwdha prps aur ryast ka mwazanha krkay is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye kam krta hay keh aya dwbarha ryndar zurwry hay ya nhayn۔ sst lwdangh ka astamal kryn: sst lwdangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo ajzaaa ko lwda krkay sirf is wkt astamal ki jaskty hay jab un ki zurwrt haw۔yha tknyk kesi rd aml ki ayply kyshn kay abtdaiy bwjh kay wkt ko nmayan tawr par kam krskty haay۔ bndal saiza ko kam krna: kwda tksym krna: kwda tksym karna ayk aysy tknyk hay js ko kwda ko chhwtay hasawn main tksym krkay bndal saiza ko kam karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jo daymanda 123456 par bhry jaskty haay۔yha tknyk kesi rd aml ki drkhwast kay abtdaiy bwjh kay wkt ko nmayan tawr par kam krskty haay۔ drkht lrzanay ka astamal kryn: drkht lrzana ayk aysy tknyk hay jsay ayply kyshn 123456 sy ghair astamal shuda kwda ko hatatay hoey bndal saiza ko kam karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha tknyk ayply kyshn kay bndal kay saiza ko nmayan tawr par kam krskty haay۔ GZIP kmpryshn ka astamal kryn: GZIP kmpryshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jsay klaint 123456 par bhyjnay sy pehlay kwda ko kmprys krkay bndal saiza ko kam karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha tknyk ayply kyshn bndal kay saiza ko nmayan tawr par kam krskty haay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki tknyk zurwry hay keh is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye keh rd aml ki ayply kyshnza tyza ، zamha dar aur mwsar hawn۔ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay kay tarykwn main React.memo ya purecompient ، quarecomponentupdate ، aur sst lwdangh ka astamal shaml haay۔bndal kay saiza ko kam karnay kay tarykwn main kwda tksym ، drkht lrzanay aur jy zayda aai py kmpryshn ka astamal shaml haay۔yha tknyk ayk rd aml ki ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bnaskty hay aur bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krskty haay۔

Question: aap rd aml kay ajzaaa ki janch ko kis tarah snbhaltay hain jo byrwny anhasaar ya API par anhasaar karty hayn؟
Answer: jab byrwny anhasaar ya APIs par anhasaar karty hain tou rd aml kay ajzaaa ki janch karty wkt ، un anhasaar ka mzaak araana zurwry hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh tyst khud jzaw 123 par mrkwza haay۔yhaan rd aml kay ajzaaa ki janch sy nmtnay kay liye kuch tarykay hain jo byrwny anhasaar ya API par anhasaar karty hayn: byrwny anhasaar ka mzaak araatay hayn: byrwny anhasaar jesay APIs ya tesri party ki laibryry 123 jesay mzaak ya dyghr tystngh laibryrywn ka astamal kryn۔yha nktaha nzar is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh tyst khud hi jzaw par mrkwza hain nah keh byrwny anhasaar pr۔yha nktaha nzar is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh ajzaaa byrwny anhasaar kay sath sahayha tarykay sy kam karty hayn۔ asnyp shat tystngh ka astamal kryn: asnyp shat tystngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo jzaw 5 kay bsary aaؤt pt ko janchnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty haay۔yha nktaha nzar is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh jzaw sahayha aur mstkl tawr par pysh krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، jab byrwny anhasaar ya API par anhasaar karnay waly rd aml kay ajzaaa ki janch karty hain tou ، un anhasaar ka mzaak araana zurwry hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh tyst jzaw par hi twjha mrkwza karty hayn۔byrwny anhasaar ya API par anhasaar karnay waly rd aml kay ajzaaa ki janch sy nmtnay kay tarykwn main byrwny anhasaar ka mzaak araana ، anzumam ki janch ka astamal karna ، aur asnyp shat tystngh ka astamal karna shaml haay۔yha tknyk is bat ko ykyny bnaty hain keh ajzaaa byrwny anhasaar kay sath sahayha tarykay sy kam karain aur sahayha aur mstkl tawr par ryndar kryn۔

Question: rd aml ki ghltay sy nmtnay kay tsawr aur ghltay ki hadwd kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml ki ghltay ko hayndalngh karna rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main ghltay sy nmtnay ka ayk aham phalw haay۔saarf aur dawylpr kay tjrbay main mdakhlt sy rwknay kay liye ghltaywn ko khwbsawrty sy snbhalna zurwry haay۔rd aml main ghltaywn ko snbhalnay ka ayk tarykha ghltay ki hadwd ka astamal karna haay۔ghltay ki hadwd rd aml kay ajzaaa hain jo jawa askrpt ki ghltaywn ko apnay bchwn kay jzaw kay drkht main kahain bhi pkraty hain ، un ghltaywn ko lagh un karain ، aur jzaw kay drkht ki bjaiay fal byk UI dasplay karain jo 1234 ghr kar tbaha hoa tha۔ghltay ki hadwd ko astamal karnay kay kuch fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr saarf ka tjrbha: ghltay ki hadwd ayply kyshn 1234 ko krysh karnay kay bjaiay fal byk UI ki nmaish krkay ry aykt ayply kyshn kay saarf kay tjrbay ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bnaskty hayn۔ bytr ghltay sy hayndalngh: ghltay ki hadwd ghltaywn ko fzul sy nmtnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty hain awrdaybghngh kay mkasad 1234 kay liye un ko lagh un kryn۔ daybghngh: ghltay ki hadwd is bat ka wazuha asharha fraham krkay daybghngh ko aasan bnaty hain jahan ghltay waka hui haay۔ ghltay ki hadwd ko astamal karnay kay liye ، dawylprza ayk klas jzaw tshkyl dy saktay hain jo laif saiykl kay tarykwn ki (ya dwnwn) ki wzuahat krta hay js main jamd ghytydarda astyt fyrwmr (ya dwnwn) ki wzuahat hawty hay (ya dwnwn)) ya ajzaaa dayda kych ()۔ghltay phynknay kay bad fal byk UI pysh karnay kay liye jamd getderivedstateFromerror () astamal kryn۔ghltay 1234 ko lagh un karnay kay liye ajzaaa dayda kych () ka astamal kryn۔ghltay ki hadwd ko astamal karnay kay liye yahan kuch bhatryn tarykwn sy yeh hayn: un ko kam sy astamal kryn: ghltay ki hadwd ko sirf un aham ajzaaa kay liye astamal karain jo ghltaywn ka shkar hain ۔156234۔ un ko mkml tawr par rkhyn: tyst ki ghltay ki hadwd ko achhy tarah sy yeh ykyny bnanay kay liye keh woh sahayha tarykay sy kam karty hain aur twka 156234 kay tawr par lagh un kryn۔: jab koi ghltay waka hawty hay tou bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham karnay kay liye fal byk UIS ka astamal kryn۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml ki ghltay sy nmtnay kay liye zurwry hay keh is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye keh rd aml ki ayply kyshnza tyza ، zamha dar aur mwsar hawn۔ghltay ki hadwd ghltaywn ko khwbsawrty sy snbhalnay aur saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham karnay ka ayk tarykha haay۔ghltay ki hadwd ko astamal karnay kay bhatryn tarykwn main un ko thwraa sa astamal karna ، un ki achhy tarah sy janch karna ، aur fal byk byk uis.1logrocket2reactjs3bitsrc4semaphoreci5developerwayle6appsignal shaml hayn۔

Question: rd aml syak wa sbak API kya haay؟ryasty antzaam kay l red yeh rydawks sy kesay mkhtlf haay؟
Answer: ry aykt syak wa sbak API rd aml main ayk blt un khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko prwp darlngh 123456 ki zurwrt kay baghair ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta shyir karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha ayk halka phlka hal hay jo chhwtay sy drmyanay drjay ki ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn hay jo ryast kay antzaam ki aasan zurwryat kay sath haay۔dwsry taraf ، rydaks ayk awpn swrs laibryry hay jo astwr 123456 main trmym karnay kay liye ayk mrkzay astwr aur aykshn fraham krty haay۔yha zayada taaktwr aur pysh kyasy hay aur yeh bray aur pychydha ayply kyshnza kay l suitable mwzawn haay۔ yahan rd aml kay syak wa sbak kay darmiyan kuch akhtlafat hayn: ryasty antzaamyha: ry aykt syak wa sbak ko ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta shyir karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، jabky rydawks ko sntrlaizada astyt mynjmnt 123456.complecity kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔: rd aml syak wa sbak ka astamal redux123456 kay mkablay main aasan aur aasan haay۔rd aml syak wa sbak API ayk halka phlka hal hay jo ryast kay antzaam ki aasan zurwryat kay sath chhwtay sy drmyanay drjay kay ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn hay ، jabky rydaks zayada taaktwr aur pysh ghwiy ki jaskty hay aur bray aur pychydha ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn haay۔ks tyknalwjy ko astamal karnay ka antkhab prwjykt ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur rkawtwn par mnhasar haay۔

Question: aap kesi rd aml ki ayply kyshn main srwr saiyda ryndarngh ko kis tarah snbhaltay hain js kay liye twsayk ki zurwrt hawty haay؟
Answer: jab kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn main srwr saiyda ryndarngh ko snbhaltay ho js main twsayk ki zurwrt hawty hay tou ، bohat sari hakmt amlyyn hain jo dawylpr astamal krsktay hayn۔ayk ry aykt ayply kyshn main srwr saiyda ryndarngh ko snbhalnay kay liye yahan kuch tarykay hain js main twsayk ki zurwrt hawty haay: tsadyk kay twkn ko klaint saiyda par astwr kryn: ayk hakmt amly yeh hay keh klaint saiyda par twsayk ki twkn astwr karain ، msaal kay tawr par ، braؤzar kay mkamy astwryj 1 mynyha nktaha nzar drkhwast ko mwad ki frahamy kay nyt wrk (sy day ayn) par taynat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay aur saarf ko fwry tawr par askryn par pysh krdha kuch dykhnay kay kabl bnata haay۔taham ، agar koi ghair tsadyk shuda saarf kesi safhaay ko dykhnay ki kwshsh krta hay tou ، ghair tsadyk shuda mwad ki ayk flysh hawghy۔ srwr saiyda ki twsayk ka astamal kryn: ayk aur hakmt amly yeh hay keh ayksprys daat jay ays srwr 2 kay liye srwr saiyda ki twsayk ko nafza kya jaiay۔as nktaha nzar main srwr saiyda par bnyady srwr saiyda ki twsayk ko nafza karna aur srwr saiyda par mhafwza lagh un faalyt ko nafza karnay kay liye kuch rd aml ki twsayk kay bhatryn tarykwn par tbadlha khyal karna shaml haay۔as nktaha nzar main srwr par kesi safhaay ka abtdaiy HTML tyar karnay kay liye srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) ka astamal karna aur phir rd aml ko fraham karnay kay liye klaint par dwbarha rd aml ka azahaar karna shaml haay۔klrk aur aghla. jay ays ays ays aar kay sath ، dawylpr chyk krsktay hain keh saarf ki twsayk ki hogi hay aur ، agar nahin tou ، klaint par kesi bhi chyza ko pysh kyay baghair inhain sain un safhaay par ry daairykt kryn۔ khlasaha main ، jab kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn main srwr saiyda ryndarngh ko snbhaltay hawtwsayk ki zurwrt hawty hay ، dawylpr mkhtlf hakmt amlywn ka astamal krsktay hain jesay klaint saiyda par twsayk twkn ko astwr karna ، srwr saiyda ki twsayk ka astamal karty hoey ، ya klrk kay sath nykst daat jay ays ays ays aar twsayk ka astamal۔yha hakmt amly is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh ayply kyshn mhafwza hay aur saarf apni zurwrt kay mwad tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔

Question: ry aykt mymw kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah fnkshnl ajzaaa ki pysh ksh ko bhatr bnata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt mymw ayk aaly aardar ka jzaw (HOC) hay jo rd aml main astamal kya jaskta hay jo ghair zurwry dwbarha ryndarza 123456 ko kam krkay fnkshnl ajzaaa ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔mymwraizayshn kychngh ki ayk shkl hay jo mhanghay afaal kay ntaij ko zakhyrha karnay aur bar bar kalwn sy bchnay kay liye astamal hawty hay ، js kay ntyjay main ntaij ki tkrar hawty۔rd aml mymw kesi jzaw kay ryndar kay tarykha kar kay ntyjay ko yaddasht karnay aur is ka dwbarha astamal krkay kam krta hay agar jzaw ko isi prwps 123456 kay sath dwbarha pysh kya jata haay۔ry aykt mymw kay astamal kay kuch fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: ry aykt mymw ghair zurwry dwbarha ryndarza 123456 ki tadad ko kam krkay ry aykt ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakta haay۔ kam ka bwjh: ry aykt mymw ry aykt ayply kyshn ko dwbarha sy ghryza krkay kam kay bwjh ko kam krskta haay۔pysh karnay waly ajzaaa jo 123456 tbdyl nahin hoey hayn۔ aasan kwda: rd aml mymw ryast ko snbhalnay kay liye drkar kwda ki mkdar ko kam krkay rd aml ki drkhwast kay kwda ko aasan bna sakta haay۔awr jzaw ko ayk dlyl kay tawr par pas kryn۔React.memo () ayk nya yadghar jzaw lwtata hay jo sirf is sawrt main dwbarha pysh krta hay jab prwps 123456 main bdla hoa haay۔ry aykt mymw ko astamal karnay kay liye yahan kuch bhatryn aml hayn: is ko thwraa sa astamal kryn: sirf un ajzaaa kay liye rd aml mymw ka astamal karain jo pychydha mntak 123456 kay liye mhanghay hon ya is ki achhy tarah sy janch kryn: tyst mymw ko achhy tarah sy janchnay kay liye yeh ykyny bnanay kay liye keh yeh sahayha tarykay sy kam krta hay aur ghair zurwry ki tadad ko kam krta haay۔dwbarha ryndarza 123456. isy danshmndy sy astamal kryn: jab jzaw bhary nahin hawta hay aur aam tawr par mkhtlf prwps 5 kay sath pysh krta hay tou is sy prhayza karnay kay fwaid ki pymaish krkay aur is sy ghryza karnay sy mymw ko danshmndy sy astamal kryn۔ghyr zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ki tadad ko kam krkay ry aykt ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaiyn۔ry aykt mymw ko astamal karnay kay bhatryn tarykwn main is ko thwraa sa astamal karna ، is ki achhy tarah sy janch karna ، aur isy danshmndy sy astamal karna shaml haay۔

Question: kwda tnzaym aur prwjykt kay dahanchay kay liye bhatryn aml kya hayn؟
Answer: kwda aarghnaizayshn aur prwjykt kay dahanchay kay liye bhatryn tarykwn ka rd aml kabl twsya aur brkrar rkhnay waly rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki tshkyl kay l essential zurwry haay۔ry aykt kwda ko mnzam karnay kay liye yahan kuch bhatryn aml hayn: ayk wazuha aur mstkl fail aur fwldar dahanchha ka astamal kryn: dawylprza ko kwda 123456 ko tlash karnay aur un ko smjhnay main aasan bnanay kay liye ayk wazuha aur mstkl fail aur fwldar dahanchha astamal kryn۔har fail aur ajzaaa 123456 kay mksad ko smjhna aasan bnaiyn۔ khsawsayt ya madaywl kay zaryaha ghrwp: ghrwp failyn aur ajzaaa khsawsayt ya madaywl kay zaryaha ayply kyshn ki sakht 123456 ko smjhnay main aasan bnaiyn۔klas kay bjaiay fail dahanchay ko zayada sy zayada kmplysyt karnay sy bchnay kay l .۔ klas kay bjaiay fnkshnl ajzaaa aur haks ka astamal kryn: karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l class klaswn kay bjaiay fnkshnl ajzaaa aur haks ka astamal kryn۔khlasaha yeh hay keh ، kwda aarghnaizayshn aur prwjykt kay dahanchay kay l best bhatryn tarykwn par rd aml zaahar karnay aur brkrar rkhnay waly rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki tshkyl kay l essential zurwry hayn۔bhatryn tarykwn main ayk wazuha aur mstkl fail aur fwldar dahanchay ka astamal ، nam kay knwnshnwn ko nafza karna ، khsawsayt ya madaywl kay zaryaha ghrwp bndy karna ، ghhwnsla ko mhadwd karna ، klaswn kay bjaiay fnkshnl ajzaaa aur haks ka astamal karna ، aur agar mmkn ho tou ryast kay astamal sy ghryza karna shaml hayn۔an bhatryn tarykwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylprza ry aykt ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hain jo smjhnay ، brkrar rkhnay aur pymanay main aasan hayn۔

Question: aap rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main safhaha bndy ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟safhaha bndy ki mkhtlf tknykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main safhaha bndy ayk aam khsawsayt hay jo saarfyn ko kesi ayk safhaay kay bjaiay safhaat ki ayk syryza par dayta dykhnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔safhaha bndy ki mkhtlf tknykyn hain jn ko dawylprza ry aykt ayply kyshnza main safhaha bndy ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan sab sy aam safhaha bndy ki tknyk hayn: klaint saiyda pyghynyshn: klaint saiyda pyghynyshn ayk aysy tknyk hay js main klaint ki taraf waly tamam dayta ko lwda karna aur phir isy safhaat 123456 main tksym karna shaml haay۔yha tknyk chhwtay daytasyts kay l suitable mwzawn hay aur is ko ry aykt astyt aur prwp kay astamal sy nafza kya jaskta haay۔ srwr saiyda pyjynyshn: srwr saiyda pyjynyshn ayk aysy tknyk hay js main srwr sy dayta ka sirf ayk hasaha lwda karna aur phir isy pyjza 123456 main tksym karna shaml haay۔yha tknyk braay daytasyts kay l suitable mwzawn hay aur srwr saiyda tknalwjywn jesay nwda daat jay aur ayksprys ka astamal karty hoey is par aml draamd kya jaskta haay۔yha tknyk braay daytasyts kay sath ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn hay aur is ko ry aykt laibryrywn jesay ry aykt anfaint-skrwl-ajzaaa ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔daytasyt 123456 myn۔yha tknyk braay daytasyts wali ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn hay aur srwr saiyda tyknalwjyza jesay ghraf kyw ayl daat un smry ka astamal karty hoey is par aml draamd kya jaskta hay ، pyjynyshn ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ayk aam khsawsayt hay jo saarfyn ko safhaat ki ayk syryza par dayta dykhnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔mkhtlf safhaha bndy ki tknykwn main klaint saiyda pyghynyshn ، srwr saiyda pyghynyshn ، lamhadwd skrwlngh ، aur krsr par mbny safhaha bndy shaml hayn۔dawylprza safhaha bndy ki tknyk ka antkhab krsktay hain jo un ki drkhwast ki zurwryat aur zurwryat ko bhatryn tawr par mnasb bnata haay۔

Question: mthark draamdat ka astamal karty hoey sst lwdangh aur kwda tksym karnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mthark draamdat ka astamal karty hoey sst lwdangh aur kwda tksym karna aysy tknyk hain jo ayply kyshn kay abtdaiy bwjh wkt ko kam krkay ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn۔yha kesay kam krta haay: mthark draamdat: mthark draamdat kwda tksym karnay ka ayk tarykha hay ، jo sst lwdangh 123 main mrkzay haysayt rkhta haay۔mthark draamdat dawylprza ko apnay kwda ko chhwtay hasawn main tksym karnay aur mtaalbha par ladnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، bjaiay hr chyza ko lwda karnay ki bjaiay۔ rykt۔ lyzay (): rd aml۔ lyzay () ayk aysa fnkshn hay jo dawylprza ko bakaadha ajzaaa 143 kay tawr par mthark draamd ko kabl bnata haay۔yha fnkshn dawylprza ko lazmi tawr par ajzaaa ko lwda karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، yany aan daymanda par jab un ki zurwrt hawty haay۔sspns kuch fal byk byk mwad ki akasy karnay main mdd krta hay jabky sst jzaw ka bwjh۔as tknyk kay liye sst bwjh waly rastay kay ajzaaa par mthark ampwrt () ka atalak karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ yahan rd aml sst lwdangh aur kwda tksym karnay kay liye kuch bhatryn aml hayn: is ko thwraa sa astamal kryn: sst lwdangh aur kwda tksym sirf un ajzaaa kay liye astamal karain jo mhangha hay ya pychydha mntak 164235 haay۔.ayk yeh achhy tarah sy tyst kryn: sst lwdangh aur kwda ko achhy tarah sy tyst karain takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh yeh sahayha tarykay sy kam krta hay aur ayply kyshn kay abtdaiy bwjh kay wkt ko kam krta hay ۔164235. isy danshmndy sy astamal kryn: is ko astamal karnay kay fwaid ki pymaish krkay aur is sy prhayza karty hoey kwda ko tksym karnay ka astamal kryn۔jzaw bhary nahin hawta hay aur aam tawr par mkhtlf prwps 3 kay sath pysh krta haay۔ smry main ، mthark draamdat ka astamal karty hoey sst lwdangh aur kwda tksym karna aysy tknyk hain jo drkhwast kay abtdaiy bwjh kay wkt ko kam krkay ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn۔rd aml sst lwdangh aur kwda tksym kay astamal kay bhatryn tarykwn main is ko thwraa Question: skht rd aml ka mksad kya haay؟yha mmknha amwr ki nshandhay karnay main kis tarah mdd krta haay؟
