Answer: ry aykt ryndar prps ayk prwp ka astamal karty hoey rd aml kay ajzaaa kay mabyn kwda ko bantnay kay liye ayk tknyk hain js ki kymt ayk fnkshn 12 haay۔fnkshn ayk rd aml ka ansar lwtata hay jsay apni ryndar mntak ko nafza karnay kay bjaiay kaha jata haay۔ryndar prps jzaw sakht kay l useful mfyd hain ، jahan mazeed pychydha faalyt pyda karnay kay liye ajzaaa dusray ajzaaa par mushtamil hawsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch tarykay hain jn main ajzaaa ki tshkyl kay liye ryndar prps ko astamal kya jaskta haay: ajzaaa kay mabyn kwda ka ashtrak: ryndar prps ko ajzaaa kay mabyn kwda shyir karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js sy zayada mwsar aur dwbarha astamal kay kabl kwda 123. kras katnay waly khdshat ka astamal kya jaskta haay: ryndar prps ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔ayk hi ryast ya tarza aml ki zurwrt waly ajzaaa kay mabyn ryast ya tarza aml ka ashtrak kryn۔dwbarha kabl astamal ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo mtadd prwjykts 23 main astamal hawsktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml pysh karnay waly prwps ayk prwp ka astamal karty hoey rd aml kay ajzaaa kay mabyn kwda shyir karnay ki ayk tknyk hain js ki kymt ayk fnkshn haay۔ajzaaa ki tshkyl ، ajzaaa kay mabyn kwda shyirngh ، kras ktngh kay khdshat ، tkhsaysa ، aur kwda kay dwbarha astamal kay liye ryndar prps ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔ryndar prps ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza apni ry aykt ayply kyshnza main zayada mwsar aur dwbarha kabl astamal kwda tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: ry aykt haks kay kwaad aur bhatryn aml kya hayn؟aam ghltaywn aur un sy bchnay kay tarykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly ry aykt kwda ko lkhnay kay liye ry aykt haks kay kwaad aur bhatryn aml zurwry hayn۔ry aykt haks kay astamal kay l some kuch kwaad aur bhatryn aml yeh hayn: aaly staha par kal haks: kesi bhi abtdaiy wapsy sy pehlay haks ko ry aykt fnkshn kay awpry staha par blaya jana chahaiay ، takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh woh hr bar ayk hi trtyb main blaya jata haay۔ajzaaa ryndarza 123456. sirf rd aml kay afaal sy haks kal kryn: haks ko sirf rd aml kay afaal sy nahin kaha jana chahaiay ، nah keh bakaadghy sy jawa askrpt kay afaal ya klas ajzaaa 123456 say۔awr ryndarngh ya astailngh 123456 kay liye nhayn۔ sahayha trtyb main haks ka astamal kryn: haks ko sahayha trtyb main astamal kya jana chahaiay ، ywsysfykt haks 123456 sy pehlay aanay waly ywsstyt haks kay sath۔ kwda dwbarha astamal kay l custom kstm haks ka astamal kryn: dawylprza ko dawylprza ki ajazat di jany chahaiay۔ajzaaa 123456 kay darmiyan ryast ki mntak ka ashtrak kryn۔ jab rd aml kay haks ka astamal karty wkt kamn ghltaywn main lwp ، shraita ، ya ghhwnslay waly afaal kay andr kalngh haks ، klas ajzaaa ya bakaadha jawa askrpt kay afaal sy haks kal karna ، aur ryndarngh ya astailngh kay liye haks ka astamal shaml hayn۔an ghltaywn sy bchnay kay l develop ، dawylprza ko ry aykt haks kay astamal kay kwaad aur bhatryn tarykwn par aml karna chahaiay۔ khlasaha ، ry aykt haks kay kwaad aur bhatryn aml mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly ry aykt kwda ko lkhnay kay liye zurwry hayn۔dawylprza ko aaly staha par haks ko kal karnay kay kwaad par aml karna chahaiay aur sirf ry aykt afaal sy ، ryasty mntak kay liye haks ka astamal ، sahayha trtyb main haks ka astamal karna ، aur kwda kay dwbarha astamal kay liye kstm haks ka astamal karna chahaiay۔an kwaad aur bhatryn tarykwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylprza mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly rd aml ka kwda lkh saktay hayn۔

Question: aap rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main zamha dar dayzaain ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟jwabdha trtyb bnanay ki tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main jwabdha trtyb bnanay kay liye mtadd tknykyn hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tknykyn hayn: mydaya kay swalat: mydaya kay swalat ayk mayary sy ays ays tknyk hain jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza 12 main jwabdha trtyb bnanay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn۔mydaya sy mtalk swalat dawylprza ko askryn kay saiza par mbny jzaw main mkhtlf shylywn ka atalak karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ REACT-Responsive: rd aml rdaml ayk aysy laibryry hay jo askryn saiza 345 par mbny ajzaaa par rd aml zaahar karnay kay liye mkhtlf shylywn ko laghw karnay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krty haay۔yha ajzaaa aur haks ka ayk mjmwaha fraham krta hay jo jwabdha trtyb bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ un lain astailza: un lain astail ko askryn saiza 2 par mbny jzaw main mkhtlf astail ka atalak krkay rd aml ayply kyshnza main jwabdha trtyb bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔as tknyk main jawa askrpt ko kesi jzaw par shylywn ka atalak karnay kay liye astamal karna shaml haay۔: sy ays ays frym wrk jesay bwtstryp aur madyzaaiza ko ry aykt ayply kyshnza 12 main jwabdha trtyb bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha frym wrk pehlay sy taay shuda astail aur ajzaaa mhaya karty hain jo jwabdha trtyb pyda karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main jwabdha trtyb bnana mkhtlf tknykwn jesay mydaya kay swalat ، rd aml sy mtalk ، un lain astail ، aaly aardar kay ajzaaa ، aur sy ays ays ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jaskta haay۔frym wrkdawylprza is tknyk ka antkhab krsktay hain jo un ki drkhwast ki zurwryat aur zurwryat ko bhatryn bnaiay۔

Question: rd aml syak wa sbak API kay tsawr aur aalmy ryast kay antzaam kay l its is kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt syak wa sbak API ayk khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko hr staha 123456 par dsty tawr par nechay kay baghair ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta shyir karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha jzaw kay drkht kay zaryaay dayta ko mntkl karnay aur isy tamam ajzaaa ko dstyab karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔ry aykt syak wa sbak API ko aalmy ryast kay antzaam kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jahan dayta ko ayk hi jghha par mhafwza kya jaskta hay aur drkhwast main kahain bhi rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔yhaan kuch aysay tarykay hain jn main aalmy ryast kay antzaam kay liye rd aml syak wa sbak ka astamal kya jaskta haay: mrkzay ryast kay antzaam: ry aykt syak wa sbak ko ayk mrkzay dayta astwr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay js tak is ki pwzayshn sy ktaa nzar ، drkht kay kesi bhi jzaw kay zaryaha rsaiy haasal ki jaskty hay aur isy ap dayt kya jaskta haay۔ajzaaa kay mabyn haaiyrarchy 4. shyirngh dayta myn: ry aykt syak wa sbak API ko ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta shyir karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js sy ayply kyshn astyt ka antzaam karna aur kwda prahnay ki ahalyt aur brkrar rkhnay ko bhatr bnana aasan hawjata haay۔byrwny zaraia sy haasal krdha jesay APIs ya dayta bys aur isy tamam ajzaaa ko dstyab kryn۔krytykwntykst () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk syak wa sbak tshkyl dy sakta hay aur ayk aysy kdr fraham krskta hay js sy USEContext () hak 123456 ka astamal karty hoey bchwn kay ajzaaa tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskay۔ry aykt syak wa sbak kay astamal kay l here yahan kuch bhatryn aml hayn: is ko thwraa sa astamal kryn: rdaml kay syak wa sbak ko kam karain aur sirf aadad wa shmar kay liye js tak mtadd ajzaaa 123456 kay zaryaha rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ yeh aasan rkhyn: syak wa sbak ko aasan rakhien aur bohat sary fraham knndghan kay sath is sy zayada kmplyt karnay sy ghryza kryn۔awr saarfyn 123456. is ko achhy tarah sy janchyn: syak wa sbak ki janch pratal karain takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh yeh sahayha tarykay sy kam krta hay aur mtwka tarza aml ko fraham krta haay۔stahaas ka astamal aalmy ryasty antzaamyha ، ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta ka ashtrak ، byrwny zaraia sy dayta tak rsaiy ، aur prwp darlngh sy ghryza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ko bnanay kay liye rd aml syak wa sbak ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: ays ays aar haaiydaryshn ka rd aml kya haay؟yha srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ays ays aar haaiydaryshn ka rd aml ayk aysa aml hay jo srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) kay bad hawta hay jahan srwr kay zaryaha pyda hony wala aych ty aym ayl mwad ayk ry aykt jzaw kay drkht main tbdyl hawjata hay jsay klaint saiyda jawa askrpt 123456 kay zaryaha haaiydaryt kya jaskta haay۔haaiydaryshn ka aml rd aml kay jzaw kay drkht ko antrayktw bnnay aur saarf kay un pt ka jwab denay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha kuch tarykay hain jn main ays ays aar haaiydaryshn ka rd aml srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kam krta haay: srwr saiyda ryndarngh: srwr HTML mwad tyar krta hay jo klaint 123456 ko bhyja jata haay۔ayk rd aml ka jzaw try 123456۔mzasyt: rd aml sy mtalk maahadha karnay waly APIs ka aktdar snbhalta hay aur sait antrayktw 123456 bn jati haay۔ srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main hamwar saarf ka tjrbha fraham karnay kay liye aar aay sy ty ays ays aar haaiydaryshn aham haay۔ry aykt ajzaaa kay drkht ko haaiydaryt krkay ، ayply kyshn antrayktw hawjaty hay aur saarf kay un pt ka jwab dy sakti haay۔as bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye keh ays ays aar haaiydaryshn ka sahayha tarykay sy kam krta hay ، dawylprza ko kuch bhatryn tarykwn par aml karna chahaiay ، jesay mfahamt ki ghltaywn sy bchnay kay liye yw ays ay ay ayf ay sy ty () ka astamal karna aur ayply kyshn ko achhy tarah sy janchnay kay liye yeh ykyny bnanay kay liye keh yeh sahayha tarykay sy kam krta haay۔srwr kay zaryaha ayk ry aykt ajzaaa kay drkht main pyda hony wala HTML mwad jsay klaint saiyda jawa askrpt kay zaryaha haaiydaryt kya jaskta haay۔haaiydaryshn ka aml rd aml kay jzaw kay drkht ko antrayktw bnnay aur saarf kay un pt ka jwab denay ki ajazat dyta haay۔bhatryn tarykwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylpr is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh ays ays aar haaiydaryshn ka rd aml sahayha tarykay sy kam krta hay aur srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main baghair kesi hamwar saarf ka tjrbha fraham krta haay۔

Question: aap ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟braha rast dayta ko snbhalnay ki tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ryil taim apdayts jdyd wyb ayply kyshnza main ayk lazmi khsawsayt hain ، aur rd aml braha rast dayta ko snbhalnay kay liye mtadd tknyk mhaya krta haay۔ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim ap dayts ko snbhalnay kay liye yahan kuch aam tknykyn hayn: HTTP pwlngh: HTTP pwlngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jahan mؤkl ap dayt 1 ki janch pratal kay liye bakaadha wkfwn par srwr ko drkhwast bhyjta haay۔as tknyk ko ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ syrwr synt aywnts (ays ays ay): ays ays ay ayk aysy tknyk hay jahan srwr klaint ko ayk hi HTTP knkshn 12 par ap dayt bhyjta haay۔as tknyk ko ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ wyb sakts: wyb sakts ayk prwtwkwl hay jo klaint aur srwr 123 kay mabyn ayk mkml dawplyks mwasalaty chynl fraham krta haay۔as tknyk ko ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ fair bys: fair bys ayk klaؤda bysda plyt farm hay jo ryil taim dayta ki hum aahanghy aur astwryj 4 fraham krta haay۔as ka astamal ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko snbhalnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ chynj astrymza: chynj astrymza mnghw day by ki ayk khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko dayta bys main tbdylywn ko snnay aur ryil taim 5 main un par rd aml zaahar karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔as tknyk ko ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko snbhalnay sy mkhtlf tknykwn jesay aych ty ty py pwlngh ، ays ays ay ، wyb skat ، fair bys ، aur tbdyly kay slslay ko astamal kya jaskta haay۔dawylprza is tknyk ka antkhab krsktay hain jo un ki drkhwast ki zurwryat aur zurwryat ko bhatryn tawr par mnasb bnaiay۔

Question: klas ajzaaa sy zayada haks aur un kay fwaid kay sath rd aml fnkshnl ajzaaa kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: haks kay sath ry aykt fnkshnl ajzaaa rd aml kay ajzaaa ko lkhnay ka ayk nya tarykha hay jo tabkaty ajzaaa sy zayada fwaid fraham krta haay۔haks kay sath fnkshnl ajzaaa kay astamal kay kuch fwaid yeh hayn: sadghy: haks waly fnkshnl ajzaaa isi tarah ki pychydghy 123 kay klas ajzaaa kay mkablay main aasan aur smjhnay main aasan hayn۔wha dawylprza ko zayada jama aur prahnay kay kabl kwda lkhnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ rywsyblty: haks kay sath fnkshnl ajzaaa klas ajzaaa sy zayada dwbarha kabl astamal hain kywnkha woh zayada aasany sy 123 par mushtamil hawsktay hayn۔an ka astamal kstm haks bnanay kay liye kya jaskta hay jo mtadd ajzaaa main shyir kyay jasktay hayn۔ karkrdghy: haks waly fnkshnl ajzaaa klas ajzaaa sy zayada prfarmns hawtay hain kywnkha woh ajzaaa 123 ki ghair zurwry msaal nahin bnatay hayn۔wha ryndarngh ki bhatr asalaha ki bhi ajazat dytay hayn۔ bytr astyt mynjmnt: haks kay sath fnkshnl ajzaaa klas ajzaaa sy bhatr ryasty antzaam fraham karty hain kywnkha woh ywsstyt hak 123 kay astamal ki ajazat dytay hayn۔yha hak fnkshnl ajzaaa main ryast ka antzaam karnay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta haay۔ haks kay sath fnkshnl ajzaaa ka astamal karnay kay liye ، dawylprza react124536 kay zaryaha fraham krdha USESTATE ، USEEFECT ، USECONTEXT ، aur dyghr haks astamal krsktay hayn۔yha haks bhatr ryasty antzaam ، zumny asar sy nmtnay aur syak wa sbak ki ashtrak ki ajazat dytay hayn۔haks kay sath fnkshnl ajzaaa ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko lkh saktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، haks kay sath fnkshnl ajzaaa klas ajzaaa kay mkablay main kiy fwaid fraham karty hain ، jn main sadghy ، dwbarha astamal ، karkrdghy aur bhatr ryasty antzaam shaml hayn۔dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ko lkhnay kay liye rd aml kay zaryaha fraham krdha ywstyt ، yw ays ay ayf ay sy ty ، aur dyghr haks astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: rd aml ki rsai kay bhatryn aml kya hayn؟kabl rsaiy rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml ki rsai kay bhatryn aml aysay wyb ayply kyshnza ki tshkyl kay l essential zurwry hain jo tamam saarfyn kay liye kabl rsaiy hon ، jn main mazawr afrad bhi shaml hayn۔kabl rsaiy rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye yahan kuch aam tknykyn hayn: symntk aych ty aym ayl ka astamal kryn: symntk aych ty aym ayl anasar jesay <haydar> ، <nywy> ، <myn> ، aur <fwtr> ka astamal karty hoey ry aykt ayply kyshnza 123456 ki rsai ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔yha anasar maawn tyknalwjyza kay liye syak wa sbak fraham karty hain aur saarfyn kay liye ayply kyshn ko nywyghyt karna aasan bnatay hayn۔ astamal karain aay aar aai aay awsaaf: aay aar aai aay (kabl rsaiy bhrpwr antrnyt ayply kyshnza) awsaaf ko maawn tyknalwjyza ko azuafy malwmat fraham karnay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza 123456 ki rsai ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔aay aar aai aay kay awsaaf ko kesi ansar ، is ki ryast aur is kay krdar kay mksad ki wzuahat kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ tsaawyr kay liye mtbadl mtn: ALT wsaf ka astamal karty hoey tsaawyr kay liye mtbadl mtn ki frahamy REACT ayply kyshnza 123456 ki rsai ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔mtbadl mtn un saarfyn kay liye shbyhaha ki tfsayl fraham krta hay jo isy nahin dykh saktay hayn۔yha tknyk ki bwrda saarfyn kay liye ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki rsai ko bhatr bnaskty haay۔ rsai kay l Test tyst: AX ، PA11Y ، aur WAVE jesay twlza ka astamal karty hoey rsai kay liye janch pratal sy mtalk ayply kyshnza 123456 main rsai kay amwr ki nshandhay karnay main mdd mil sakti haay۔an twlza ka astamal un msail ki janch kay liye kya jaskta hay jesay ghmshdha ALT safat ، aay aar aai aay awsaaf ka ghalat astamal ، aur naksa rngh kay braks۔ khlasaha main ، kabl rsaiy ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko mkhtlf tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jaskta hay jesay symntk aych ty aym ayl ، aay aar aai aay awsaaf ، mtbadl mtn ka astamal karty hawiaytsaawyr kay l ، ، lnks ko chhwrayn ، aur rsai kay l testing janch۔dawylprza is tknyk ka antkhab krsktay hain jo un ki drkhwast ki zurwryat aur zurwryat kay mtaabk haw۔kabl rsa bhatryn tarykwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylpr wyb ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hain jo tamam saarfyn kay liye kabl rsaiy hain ، jn main mazawr afrad shaml hayn۔

Question: srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main aap kwda tksym aur sst lwdangh ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: kwda tksym karnay aur sst lwdangh ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye aham tknyk hain ، khasa tawr par srwr saiyda mhaya krdha ayply kyshnza myn۔srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kwda tksym karnay aur sst lwdangh ko snbhalnay kay liye kuch tknyk yeh hayn: mthark draamdat ka astamal kryn: mthark draamdat kwda ko chhwtay hasawn main tksym karnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hain jo daymanda 1234 par bhry jaskty hayn۔as tknyk ka astamal srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ astamal kryn۔as tknyk ka astamal ajzaaa ko sirf is wkt lwda krkay srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ayply kyshnza 25۔as tknyk main srwr par abtdaiy HTML pysh karna aur phir klaint par jawa askrpt aur sy ays ays failwn ko lwda karna shaml haay۔ kwda aspltngh twlza: kwda tksym karnay waly twlza: wyb pyk aur rwl ap jesay kwda ko chhwtay tkrawn main tksym karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jsay daymanda 1236 par bhry jaskty haay۔an twlza ko srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kwda aspltngh aur sst lwdangh ko mkhtlf tknykwn jesay mthark draamdat ، rd aml۔ lyzay () ، ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jaskta haay۔sst lwdangh ، aur kwda tksym karnay waly twlza kay sath srwr saiyda ryndarngh۔dawylprza is tknyk ka antkhab krsktay hain jo un ki drkhwast ki zurwryat aur zurwryat kay mtaabk haw۔an tknykwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylprza apni rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hain aur bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: rd aml kntrwl bmkablha bay kabw ajzaaa aur un kay astamal kay maamlat kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml kay ajzaaa ko ya tou kntrwl ya bay kabw kya jaskta haay۔kntrwl ajzaaa woh hain jn main farm kay aadad wa shmar ko jzaw kay astyt 1234 kay zaryaha snbhala jata haay۔as kay braks ، bay kabw ajzaaa wahi hain jn main farm ka dayta dawm khud 5234 kay zaryaha snbhala jata haay۔kntrwl shuda aur bay kabw ajzaaa kay liye kuch astamal kay maamlat yeh hayn: kntrwl shuda ajzaaa: jab farm dayta ko jma krwanay sy pehlay twsayk karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ jab farm dayta ko jma krwanay sy pehlay hayra phyry karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ jab farm dayta ko is main mhafwza karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ajzaaa ki haalt bad main astamal 1234. jab farm kay aadad wa shmar ko mtadd ajzaaa 1234 kay darmiyan bantnay ki zurwrt haay۔ ghair mtnazaaha ajzaaa: jab farm kay aadad wa shmar ko jma krwanay sy pehlay is ki twsayk ya hayra phyry ki zurwrt nahin hawty haay۔ jab farm main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay ki zurwrt nahin haayajzaaa ki ryast bad main astamal 5234. jab farm kay aadad wa shmar ko mtadd ajzaaa 5234 kay mabyn shyir karnay ki zurwrt nahin haay۔ jab farm dayta pychydha aur kntrwl shuda jzaw 5234 kay sath antzaam karna mshkl haay۔dawylpr mthark draamdat ، rd aml۔ lyzay () ، sst lwdangh kay sath srwr saiyda ryndarngh ، aur kwda tksym karnay waly twlza 123 ka astamal krsktay hayn۔an tknykwn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza apnay rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml kay ajzaaa ko ya tou kntrwl ya bay kabw kya jaskta hay ، aur hr ayk kay apnay astamal kay maamlat hawtay hayn۔dawylprza is ksm kay jzaw ka antkhab krsktay hain jo un ki drkhwast ki zurwryat aur zurwryat kay mtaabk bhatryn haay۔srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kwda aspltngh aur sst lwdangh ko snbhalnay kay liye ، dawylpr mkhtlf tknykwn jesay mthark draamdat ، rd aml۔ lyzay () ، sst lwdangh kay sath srwr saiyda ryndarngh ، aur kwda aspltngh twlza ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: tyza rftar ryfrysh kya haay؟as sy rd aml main trkyaty tjrbay ko kis tarah bhatr bnaya jata haay؟
Answer: rd aml fast ryfrysh ayk khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko jzaw astyt 123 ko khwnay kay baghair kryb kay ryil taim main apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa main tbdylyan dykhnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha pranay ry aykt haat lwdar ki jghha la lyta hay aur trky kay doran ajzaaa ko ap dayt karnay ka tyza ، zayada kabl aatmad tarykha fraham krta haay۔rd aml fast ryfrysh kam ps mnzar main jzaw kay drkht ko ap dayt krkay aur mkml safhaay ki zurwrt kay baghair tbdylywn ka atalak krkay tbdyl kryn۔kryby wkt kay kryb un kay ajzaaa kw۔mkml safhaha Reload123. fast ryfrysh ka astamal karnay kay l develop ، dawylprza isy apnay trkyaty mahawl main twlza jesay ry aykt ayp ya aghla. js123 ka astamal karty hoey kabl bnasktay hayn۔ry aykt fast ryfrysh ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza trkyaty tjrbay ko bhatr bna saktay hain aur zayada mwsar ry aykt ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml fast ryfrysh ayk khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko jzaw ki haalt ko khwnay kay baghair kryb kay ryil taim main apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa main tbdylyan dykhnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha trky kay doran ajzaaa ko ap dayt karnay ka ayk tyza ، zayada kabl aatmad tarykha fraham krta hay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki daybghngh salahaytwn ko bhatr bnata haay۔rd aml fast ryfrysh ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza trkyaty tjrbay ko bhatr bna saktay hain aur zayada mwsar rd aml ki ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main aap twsayk aur ajazat ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main twsayk aur ajazat sy nmtna mhafwza wyb ayply kyshnza ki tamyr ka ayk aham phalw haay۔srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main twsayk aur ajazat sy nmtnay kay liye kuch tknyk aur bhatryn aml yeh hayn: srwr saiyda ki twsayk ka astamal kryn: srwr saiyda ki twsayk ko astamal karnay sy pehlay saarfyn ko mstnd karnay kay liye astamal kya zurwrt hawty hay agar woh twsayk nahin karty hayn۔ tesri party ki twsayk fraham karnay waly astamal kryn: tesri party ki twsayk fraham karnay waly jesay AUTH0 srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt main twsayk APIs ka astamal karna shaml haay۔ HTTPS astamal kryn: HTTPS ka astamal srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko tranzat 1234 main dayta ko khfyha krkay mhafwza karnay main mdd krskta haay۔as tknyk main srwr ko HTTPS astamal karnay kay liye tshkyl dena aur is bat ko ykyny bnana shaml hay keh tamam drkhwastyn HTTPS.in smry par ki gain ، srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main tsadyk aur ajazat sy nmtna mkhtlf tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jaskta hay jesay srwr saiyda ki twsayk ، twkn par mbny twsayk ، twkn par mbny twsayk، raؤtr ، tesri party ki twsayk fraham karnay dawylprza srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko mhafwza bna saktay hayn۔

Question: sst lwdangh kay sath rd aml sspns kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kwda tksym karnay ko kis tarah aasan bnata haay۔
Answer: sst lwdangh kay sath rd aml ki mataly ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko ajzaaa ko lazmi tawr par lwda karnay ki ajazat dy kar REACT ayply kyshnza main kwda tksym ko aasan bnaty hay aur kwda ko lwda 123456 kay antzaar main ayk lwdangh ryast ki wzuahat krty haay۔as tknyk main ajzaaa ko jawa askrpt kay alag alag hasawn main alag karnay kay liye React.lazy () fnkshn ka astamal shaml hay jo talb par bhry jaskty haay۔as kay bad sspns jzaw ko lwdangh ryast ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jabky kwda ko haasal kya jarhaa haay۔ yahan sst lwdangh kay sath rd aml sspns kay astamal kay kuch fwaid hayn: bhatr karkrdghy: sst lwdangh kay sath rd aml sspns abtdaiy bwjh ko kam krkay ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔taim 123456۔yha tknyk dawylprza ko sirf is kwda ko lwda karnay ki ajazat dyty hay js ki zurwrt hay ، jawa askrpt ki mkdar ko kam krta hay js ko daaؤn lwda karnay ki zurwrt haay۔daymanda 123456 par bhry hawiy۔as tknyk sy braay kwda byswn ka antzaam karna aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki dykh bhal ko bhatr bnana aasan hawjata haay۔ saarf ka tjrbha: sst lwdangh kay sath rdaml ka azahaar karain dawylprza ko lwdangh ryast ki aalan karnay ki ajazat dy kar bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krta hay jabky kwda ko 123456 haasal kya jarhaa haay۔yha tknyk saarfyn ko aaraa fraham krty hay keh ayply kyshn lwda ho rahi hay aur is sy bwjh kay wkt ko kam krta haay۔ sst lwdangh kay sath rd aml ka astamal karnay kay liye ، dawylprza jawa askrpt kay alag alag hasawn main ajzaaa ko alag karnay kay liye rd aml ka astamal krsktay hayn۔as kay bad sspns jzaw ko lwdangh haalt ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jabky kwda ko haasal kya jarhaa haay۔sst lwdangh kay sath ry aykt sspns ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza apni ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy aur saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، sst lwdangh kay sath rd aml sspns ayk khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko lyzaly lwda karnay ki ajazat dy kar rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main kwda tksym ko aasan bnaty hay aur aalanyha tawr par A ki wzuahat krty haay۔kwda kay bwjh kay antzaar main ryast lwda ho raha haay۔as tknyk ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hain ، kwda ko tksym karnay ko aasan bna saktay hain ، aur un ki ry aykt ayply kyshnza main saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: ryasty antzaam kay liye rd aml kay syak wa sbak kay mtbadl kya hayn؟ryasty antzaamyha ki mkhtlf laibryrywn aur un kay fwaid ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ryasty antzaamyha kay liye rd aml kay syak wa sbak kay mtbadl main mkhtlf laibryryan shaml hain jo mkhtlf fwaid aur khsawsayat fraham krty hayn۔yhaan kuch mshhawr ry aykt astyt mynjmnt wala ryasty antzaamyha laibryry hay jo mshahadha karnay waly dayta dahanchay 34 ka astamal karty hoey ryast ki tbdylywn ko tryk krty haay۔yha ryast ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk aasan aur bdyhay tarykha mhaya krta hay aur isy rd aml ya dyghr jawa askrpt frym wrk kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ zastynda: zawstynda ayk chhwty ، halka phlka astyt mynjmnt laibryry hay jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza 2 main kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، ryast kay antzaam kay syak wa sbak kay mtbadlat main mkhtlf laibryry shaml hain jo mkhtlf fwaid aur khsawsayat fraham krty hayn۔dawylprza laibryry ka antkhab krsktay Question: aap rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main aaf lain spwrt ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟aaf lain kabl ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jdyd wyb ayply kyshnza kay liye aaf lain spwrt ayk lazmi khsawsayt hay ، aur rd aml aaf lain kabl ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye mtadd tknyk mhaya krta haay۔ry aykt ayply kyshnza main aaf lain spwrt ko snbhalnay kay liye yahan kuch aam tknykyn hayn: kychngh: kychngh ko klaint ki taraf sy mkamy tawr par dayta astwr karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js sy ayply kyshn ko kam jary rkhnay ki ajazat di jaskty hay yahan tak keh jab nyt wrk knkshn khw gaya haw۔as tknyk ka astamal ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay aur saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ srws wrkrza: srws wrkrza ayk ksm ka wyb karkn hay jsay wsail kysh karnay aur ps mnzar 1354 main nyt wrk ki drkhwastwn ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔as tknyk ka astamal aaf lain spwrt fraham karnay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ lwkl astwryj: mkamy astwryj ko klaint ki taraf sy mkamy tawr par dayta astwr karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js sy drkhwast ko jary rhanay ki ajazat di jaskty hay yahan tak keh jab nyt wrk knkshn khw gaya haw۔as tknyk ka astamal rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay aur bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ aar aay sy ty aabaiy aaf lain spwrt: ry aykt aabaiy aaf lain spwrt kay hasawl kay l several kiy tarykay mhaya krta hay ، js main astamal ki pabndywn ko nafza karnay ، kychngh ، aur ktaar ki drkhwast ki drkhwast bhi shaml haay۔as tknyk ka astamal rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay aur saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ trky psnd wyb ayps (py dablyw aay): py dablyw aay wyb ayply kyshnza hain jo saarf kay aalay par anstal ki jaskty hain aur aabaiy nma tjrbha 65 fraham krskty hayn۔as tknyk ko aaf lain spwrt fraham karnay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، ry aykt ayply kyshnza main aaf lain spwrt ko snbhalnay sy mkhtlf tknykwn jesay kychngh ، srws wrkrza ، mkamy astwryj ، ry aykt aabaiy aaf lain spwrt ، aur py dablyw aay ays ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jaskta haay۔dawylprza is tknyk ka antkhab krsktay hain jo un ki drkhwast ki zurwryat aur zurwryat kay mtaabk haw۔an tknykwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylprza aaf lain kabl rd aml ki ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hain jo saarf ka bhatr Question: dawm anasar tak rsaiy aur fwks ka antzaam karnay kay liye ry aykt ryf aur is kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt ryf ayk khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko dawm anasar tak rsaiy haasal karnay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza main fwks ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yhaan kuch tarykay hain jo ry aykt ryf ko astamal kya jaskta haay: dawm anasar tak rsaiy haasal krna: ry aykt ryf ko braha rast dawm anasar tak rsaiy haasal karnay aur un sy 12345 main hayra phyry kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔as tknyk ko un pt fylda par twjha mrkwza karnay ya kesi khasa ansar par tawmar karnay jesay aamal ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ fwks ko snbhalnay: ry aykt ryf ko ry aykt ayply kyshnza 123 main fwks ka antzaam karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔jb kesi jzaw ki pysh ksh ki jati hay tou is tknyk ka astamal kesi khasa ansar par twjha mrkwza karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ lazmi mthark tsaawyr ko mthark krna: ry aykt ayply kyshnza 2 main lazmi mthark tsaawyr ko mthark karnay kay liye ry aykt ryf ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔as tknyk ko mthark tsaawyr anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jo CSS.S. antyghrytngh tesray fryk DOM laibryrywn kay sath haasal nahin kya jaskta haay: ry aykt ayply kyshnza 25 main thrda party DOM laibryrywn kay sath mrbwta karnay kay liye ry aykt ryf ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔as tknyk ka astamal tesri party kay laibryrywn kay zaryaha fraham krdha anasar tak rsaiy aur un main hayra phyry kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ry aykt ryf ayk khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko dawm anasar tak rsaiy haasal karnay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza main fwks ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔as ka astamal day aw aym anasar tak braha rast rsaiy haasal karnay ، fwks ka antzaam karnay ، lazmi mthark tsaawyr ko mthark karnay ، aur tesri party kay DOM laibryrywn kay sath mrbwta karnay jesay aml ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ry aykt ryf ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly rd aml ki ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: rd aml taip askrpt kay bhatryn aml kya hayn؟rd aml kay sath taip askrpt ko astamal karnay ki tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: taip taip askrpt kay bhatryn tarykwn main taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko lkhnay kay liye mndrjha zayl rhanma khtawta aur tknyk shaml hayn۔rd aml kay sath taip askrpt ko astamal karnay kay liye yahan kuch aam tknyk aur bhatryn tarykay hayn: awamy API kay liye antrfys astamal kryn: jab laibryry ya tesri party kay mhaytay ksm ki taryfyn tsanyf karty ho tou ، awamy APIS1 kay liye hamyshha antrfys ka astamal kryn۔yha tknyk awamy API ki wazuha taryf fraham krty hay aur dusray dawylprza kay liye laibryry ko astamal karna aasan bnaty haay۔ ajzaaa kay prwps aur ryast kay liye astamal kryn: rd aml ajzaaa kay prps aur ryast kay liye aksam kay astamal par ghwr karain kywnkha woh antrfys 1 sy zayada mhadwd hayn۔yha tknyk mrtb wkt par ghltaywn ko pkranay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki dykh bhal ko bhatr bnanay main mdd fraham krskty haay۔ rd aml ko draamd karnay kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda draamdat ka astamal kryn: taip askrpt failwn main rd aml draamd karnay kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda draamdat ka astamal kryn۔as tknyk sy kwda ko prahnay aur smjhnay main aasany pyda hawty hay aur jzaw API ki wazuha taryf fraham krty haay۔ bchwn kay liye wazuha aksam ka astamal kryn: hamyshha rd aml kay ajzaaa 2 main bchwn kay liye prwps kay liye ayk wazuha ksm fraham kryn۔yha tknyk mrtb wkt par ghltaywn ko pkranay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki dykh bhal ko bhatr bnanay main mdd fraham krskty haay۔ astamal karain mddghar aksam: taip askrpt haylpr aksam mhaya krty hay jo aam rd aml kay liye bwailr plyt ko katnay kay liye Answer: ry aykt aabaiy nywyghyshn mwbail ayply kyshnza ki tamyr ka ayk aham phalw hay js main rd aml aabaiy haay۔as main snbhalna shaml hay keh saarf ayply kyshn main askrynwn kay mabyn kis tarah tshryf la jata haay۔nywyghyshn laibryryan nywyghyshn task ko snbhalnay kay l tools twlza aur afadyt ka ayk syt fraham krty hain ، jesay saarf lagh un aur lagh aaؤt ، tsadyk kay twkn ko mhafwza tarykay sy astwr karna ، aur rsaiy twkn ko tazaha dm krna۔yhaan kuch mshhawr ry aykt aabaiy nywyghyshn laibryryan hayn: rd aml nywyghyshn: ry aykt nywyghyshn ry aykt aabaiy kay liye ayk mshhawr nywyghyshn laibryry hay jo nywyghyshn tasks 1234 ko snbhalnay ka ayk aasan aur aalanyha tarykha fraham krty haay۔yha mkhtlf ksm kay nywyghytrza ، jesay astyk ، tyb ، aur draza ki hamayt krta hay ، aur isy aasany sy ayk ry aykt aabaiy ayp main zum kya jaskta haay۔ REACT aabaiy nywyghyshn: rd aml aabaiy nywyghyshn ry aykt nywyghyshn ka ayk mkbwl mtbadl hay js par mnhasar hay aur isy astamal karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔ry aykt aabaiy 23 kay sath۔yha braha rast iOS aur Android par mkamy nywyghyshn APIs ka astamal krta hay ، jo zayada mkamy nzar aur mhasws karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ rait rwtr aabaiy: rd aml rwtr aabaiy ayk laibryry hay jo rd aml aabaiy ayply kyshnza 2 kay liye rwtngh hal fraham krty haay۔yha ry aykt rwtr ki ayk bndrghaha hay ، jo rd aml kay liye ayk mkbwl rwtngh laibryry hay ، aur nywyghyshn tasks ko snbhalnay kay liye isi tarah ka API mhaya krty haay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml aabaiy nywyghyshn main is bat sy nmtna shaml hawta hay keh saarf mwbail ayply kyshn main askrynwn kay mabyn kis tarah tshryf la jata haay۔ry aykt nywyghyshn ، aabaiy nywyghyshn ka rd aml ، aur rd aml rwtr aabaiy rd aml kay liye kuch mshhawr nywyghyshn laibryryan hayn۔an laibryrywn ka astamal karty hoey ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly rd aml sy mtalk mkamy ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hain jo bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham karty hayn۔

ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krsktay hayn۔ mhanghay kmpywtwn ko yad rkhyn: mymwizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay js main un ki bhaaly sy bchnay kay l expensive mhanghay kmpywtwn kay ntyjay main kychngh shaml haay۔yha tknyk ghair zurwry kmpywtwn ki tadad ko kam krkay mkamy ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd fraham krskty haay۔ astamal karna chahaiay۔as tknyk sy taamlat kay astamal sy prhayza kryn۔apny fharst main hr mmkn had tak kam malwmat ka astamal karain aur inhain apni shay ki tfsayl sy dkhaiyn۔ mymwry kay astamal ko kam karnay kay liye kuch hakmt amly karnay ، kyyl kwmpynt ap dayt ya pywrkwmpynt ko astamal karnay ، halkay ajzaaa ka astamal ، harmys ka astamal ، knswl kay byanat ko khtm karnay ، aur rd aml aabaiy ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr Answer: rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza main msail ki nshandhay karnay aur un ko thyk karnay kay liye dysy daybghngh twlza aur tknyk zurwry hayn۔mkamy ayply kyshnza ka maainha aur daybgh karnay kay liye Answer: psh atalaaat mwbail ayply kyshnza ka ayk aham phalw hain ، bshmwl rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza۔psh nwtyfykyshn khdmat ko mrbwta karnay kay liye kuch tknyk yeh hayn: fair bys klaؤda mysjngh (ayf sy aym) ka astamal kryn: fair bys klaؤda mysjngh ayk mkbwl psh nwtyfykyshn srws hay jsay ayndaraida aur aai aw ays daywaisza 1 ko atalaaat bhyjnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔as ko ry aykt-nty-nwtyfykyshn laibryry ka astamal karty hoey ayk ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshn main zum kya jaskta haay۔ astamal karain rd aml sy mtalk-psh-nwtfykyshn: rd aml sy mtalk-psh-nwtfykyshn ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshnza 23 main psh atalaaat ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk mkbwl laibryry haay۔yha psh atalaaat ko snbhalnay kay l tools twlza aur afadyt ka ayk mjmwaha fraham krta hay ، jesay psh atalaaat kay l the daywais ko rjstr karna ، aanay wali atalaaat ko snbhalna ، aur atalaaat ka mzaaharha krna۔ aypl psh nwtyfykyshn srws (aay py ayn) ka astamal kryn: aypl psh nwtyfykyshn srws ayk psh nwtyfykyshn srws hay jo ayk psh nwtyfykyshn srws hay jo kar sakti haay۔iOS daywaisza 4 ko atalaaat bhyjnay kay liye astamal kya jaiay۔as ko psh nwts aais laibryry ka astamal karty hoey ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshn main zum kya jaskta haay۔as ko rd aml sy mtalk mkamy tawr pr-sywnl laibryry ka astamal karty hoey ayk ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshn main zum kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza main psh nwtyfkyshn khdmat ko mrbwta karnay main fair bys klaؤda mysjngh ، ry aykt sy mtalk-psh-nwtykyshn ، aypl psh nwtyfykyshn srws jesi tknykwn ka astamal shaml haay۔، aur ghair mamwly۔an tknykwn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly rd aml ka azahaar krsktay hain jo saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham karty hayn۔

ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔yha dawylprza ko ayply kyshn main karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay aur ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ aay py kay tjzayha kar: aay py kay tjzayha kar ayk aysa aalha hay jo ayndarwiyda ayply kyshn 3 ki aay py kay fail ka tjzayha karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔as sy dawylprza ko ayply kyshn main karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay aur ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki shawlt mlty haay۔ anstabgh: anstabgh ayk aysa aalha hay jo ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshnza 3 main saarfyn sy raiay aur bgh rpwrts jma karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔as sy dawylprza ko ayply kyshn main karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay aur ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، aabaiy karkrdghy kay prwfailngh twlza ka rd aml aabaiy ayply kyshnza main karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay aur hal karnay kay liye zurwry haay۔dawylprza ayply kyshn main karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay aur ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye ry aykt prwfailr ، ayndarwiyda astwdayw prwfailr ، ayks kwda aalat ، aay py kay tjzayha kar ، aur anstabgh ka astamal krsktay hayn۔an twlza ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza ko tshkyl dy saktay hain jo bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham karty hayn۔

Question: rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza main aap dayta ki astkamt ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay ki tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza ko dayta par astkamt ki zurwrt hawty hay takha dayta ko mkamy tawr par daywais par astwr kya jaskay۔ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshnza main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye kuch tknyk yeh hayn: asyncstorage: asyncstorage rd aml aabaiy main ayk blt un API hay jo daywais 1234 par mkamy tawr par dayta ko zakhyrha karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔yha ayk mtzuad ، mstkl ، baghair khfyha krdha ، klydy kdr waly astwryj sstm hay jo pori ayp kay liye aalmy haay۔as ka astamal thwray mkdar main aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jaskta hay ، jesay saarf ki trjyhaat aur twsayk twkn۔ rydawks brkrar haay: rydawks brkrar hay ayk laibryry hay jo Asyncstorage5 ko rydawks astwr ki haalt ko brkrar rkhnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty haay۔as ka astamal mkamy ayply kyshnza main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye kya jaskta hay aur pychydha dayta dahanchay kay antzaam kay l useful mfyd saabt hawskta haay۔ askylait: ays kyw aylait ayk mkbwl dayta bys anjn hay jo daywais 34 par mkamy tawr par dayta astwr karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha ayk halka phlka aur tyza dayta bys anjn hay jsay aasany sy ayk ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshn main mrbwta kya jaskta haay۔ ryilm: dairay ayk dayta bys anjn hay jo daywais 14 par mkamy tawr par dayta astwr karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha ayk tyza aur mwsar dayta bys anjn hay jsay aasany sy ayk ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshn main zum kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، dayta ki astkamt mkamy rdaml kay liye bohat zurwry hay ، aur dawylprza asnk astwryj ، rydawks prys ، ays kyw lyt ، aur zakhyrha karnay kay liye dairay jesay tknyk ka astamal krsktay hayn۔aabaiy ayply kyshnza main dayta bazayaft kryn۔an tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly mkamy ayply kyshnza ko tshkyl dy saktay hain jo bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham karty hayn۔

Question: dysy ryast kay antzaam kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔ry aykt aabaiy kay liye ryasty antzaam kay mkhtlf halwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt aabaiy ryast kay antzaam main drkhwast kay dusray hasawn ko mtasar kyay baghair kesi jzaw ya atalak main dayta ka antzaam aur ap dayt karna shaml haay۔ry aykt aabaiy kay liye ryasty antzaam kay kuch mkhtlf hal yeh hayn: ajzaaa ki haalt: ajzaaa ki ryast ry aykt aabaiy main ayk blt un khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko ajzaaa 12 kay andr ryast ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha kesi jzaw kay andr sadha ryast kay antzaam kay l useful mfyd hay ، jesay saarf un pt۔ kwntkst API: syak wa sbak API ry aykt aabaiy main ayk blt un khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko prwps 13 ko pas kyay baghair ajzaaa kay mabyn ryast ka ashtrak karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha kesi ayply kyshn kay andr aalmy ryast kay antzaam kay l useful mfyd haay۔ REACT haks: ry aykt haks ry aykt aabaiy main ayk blt un khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko ayk fnkshnl ajzaaa 2 kay andr ryast ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha ryast ko kesi tabkaty jzaw main tbdyl kyay baghair kesi fnkshnl jzaw kay andr antzaam karnay kay liye mfyd haay۔ rydawks: rydawks ry aykt aabaiy kay liye ayk mshhawr ryasty antzaamyha laibryry hay jo dawylprza ko ayk ayply kyshn 143 kay andr aalmy staha par ryast ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha ryast kay antzaam kay l a ayk mrkzay astwr mhaya krta hay aur kesi ayply kyshn kay andr pychydha ryast kay antzaam kay l useful mfyd saabt hawskta haay۔ MOBX: MOBX ayk ryasty nzam wa nsk ki laibryry hay jo ry aykt aabaiy kay liye hay jo dawylprza ko ayk ayply kyshn 54 kay andr aalmy staha par ryast ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha ryast ko snbhalnay ka ayk aasan aur lchkdar tarykha mhaya krta hay aur kesi drkhwast kay andr pychydha ryast kay antzaam kay l useful mfyd saabt hawskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh keh ، ryast kay antzaamyha ka rd aml ، drkhwast kay dusray hasawn ko mtasar kyay baghair kesi jzaw ya drkhwast kay andr dayta ka nzam wa nsk aur ap dayt karna shaml haay۔ajzaaa ki haalt ، syak wa sbak API ، rd aml haks ، rydawks ، aur MOBX rd aml kay liye ryasty antzaam kay kuch mkhtlf hal hayn۔an halwn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly mkamy ayply kyshnza ko tshkyl dy saktay hain jo bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham karty hayn۔

Question: aabaiy tystngh frym wrk aur tknyk kya haay؟rd aml dysy ajzaaa aur faalyt ki janch kay l tools twlza aur nktaha nzar ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml dysy janch kay frym wrk aur tknykwn ko rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza kay mayar aur wshwsnyyta ko ykyny bnanay kay liye zurwry haay۔mkamy ajzaaa aur faalyt ki janch kay l some kuch mshhawr twlza aur nktaha nzar yeh hayn: mzaak: jyst: ayk mshhawr jawa askrpt tystngh frym wrk hay jo ry aykt aabaiy 123 kay pehlay sy taay shuda tymplyt main shaml haay۔yha ywnt tyst ، anzumam kay tyst ، aur akhttam sy aakhr tak tyst lkhnay kay liye ayk aasan aur aasan astamal API fraham krta haay۔ anzaaim: anzaaim ry aykt aabaiy kay liye ayk mkbwl janch ki afadyt hay jo ry aykt ajzaaa 34 ki janch kay l tools twlza ka ayk syt fraham krta haay۔as sy dawylprza ko saarf ki bat chyt ki tklyd karnay aur ajzaaa ki aaؤt pt ki janch karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ aar aay sy ty aabaiy tystngh laibryry: ry aykt aabaiy tystngh laibryry ayk laibryry hay jo ry aykt aabaiy ajzaaa 34 ki janch kay l tools twlza ka ayk syt fraham krty haay۔yha dawylprza ko tyst lkhnay ki trghyb dyta hay jo jzaw kay nfaza ki tfsaylat kay bjaiay saarf kay tjrbay par twjha mrkwza karty hayn۔ daykts: daytwks ry aykt aabaiy kay liye ayk mkbwl akhttam sy aakhr tystngh frym wrk hay jo dawylprza ko pori ayply kyshn flw 5 ki janch karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha saarf kay taaml ko nkaly karnay aur ajzaaa ki aaؤt pt ki janch karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔ apym: apym aai aw ays aur ayndarwiyda ayply kyshnza ki janch kay liye ayk mshhawr aatwmyshn twl hay ، bshmwl ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshnza 5۔yha saarf ki bat chyt ko khud kar bnanay aur ajzaaa ki aaؤt pt ki janch karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، mkamy janch kay frym wrk aur tknykwn ka rd aml rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza kay mayar aur wshwsnyyta ko ykyny bnanay kay liye zurwry haay۔dawylprza mkamy ajzaaa aur faalyt par rdaml zaahar karnay kay liye mzaak ، anzaaim ، rd aml dysy tystngh laibryry ، daytwks ، aur apym ka astamal krsktay hayn۔an twlza aur nktaha nzar ko astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur brkrar rkhnay waly mkamy ayply kyshnza ko tshkyl dy saktay hain jo bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham karty hayn۔

Answer: yahan ayk rd aml kay jzaw ki ayk msaal hay jo nam aur ay myl kay liye un pt fyldaza kay sath ayk farm dkhata haay: JSximport ry aykt ، 'react' sy 'USESTATE' ؛ fnkshn kantyktfarm () {const [nam ، syt nam] = usestate ('') ؛kanst [ay myl ، syt myl] = usestate ('') ؛const handlesubmit = (wakaha) => {aywnt.prwynt dayfalt () ؛knswl.lagh (`nam: $ {nam} ، ay myl: $ {ay myl}`) ؛} ؛wapsy (<farm onsubmit = {handlesubmit}> <lybl> nam: <an pt ki ksm = "mtn" wylyw = {nam} onchange = {(e) => syt nam (e.target.value)} /> </labet><lybl> ay myl: <an pt ki ksm = "ay myl" wylyw = {ay myl} aan chynj = {(ay) => syt myl (e.target.value)} /> < /labet> <btn ki ksm = "jma krwaiyn"> jma krwaiyn </btn> </form>) ؛} dayfalt rabtaha farm braamd karain ؛ yeh jzaw nam aur ay myl un pt fyldaza ki haalt ka antzaam karnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal krta haay۔jb farm jma kraya jata hay tou hayndalyswbyt fnkshn kaha jata hay ، aur yeh nam aur ay myl un pt fyldaza ko knswl par lagh un krta haay۔ jzaw phir farm ko nam aur ay myl kay liye do un pt fyldaza ، aur jma kranay kay btn kay sath pysh krta haay۔an pt fyldaza ko jzaw ki haalt main bandhnay kay liye wylyw aur aan chynj prps ka astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh ayk sadha sy msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk rd aml ka jzaw tshkyl diya jaye jo nam aur ay myl kay liye un pt fyldaza kay sath ayk farm dkhata haay۔dawylpr is tknyk ko azuafy un pt fyldaza aur twsayk kay sath mazeed pychydha shklyn bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔

{aapshnza۔ nkshha ((aapshn ، andayks) => ( {aapshn} ))}
) ؛ default dayfalt darap daawn mynw ko braamd karain ؛ yeh jzaw darap daaؤn mynw main mntkhb aapshn ki haalt ka antzaam karnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal krta haay۔aapshnza srny ko darap daaؤn mynw kay liye akhtyarat ki fharst ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab darap daaؤn mynw main mntkhb aapshn ko tbdyl kya jata hay tou hayndalpshn chynj fnkshn kaha jata hay ، aur yeh mntkhb krdha aapshn ki haalt ko ap dayt krta hay js ki kymt mntkhb krynmntkhb krdha aapshn۔ jzaw phir mntkhb krdha aapshn par syt krdha wylyw wsaf aur hayndalpshn chynj fnkshn main syt aan chynj wsaf kay sath mntkhb krdha tygh ka astamal karty hoey darap daaؤn mynw ko pysh krta haay۔nkshha ki tkryb ka astamal akhtyarat ki fharst par tkrar karnay kay liye kya jata hay aur hr aapshn ko btawr aapshn tygh pysh karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh ayk aasan msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk rd aml ka jzaw tshkyl diya jaye jo aapshnza ki fharst kay sath darap daaؤn mynw ko pysh krta haay۔dawylprza is tknyk ko zayada pychydha ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo dayta ko mnzam karnay aur saarf kay sath taaml kay liye ryast ka astamal karty hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo ayk lwdangh aspnr ko zaahar krta hay jabky dayta haasal kya jarhaa haay۔
Answer:
jab aadad wa shmar ki bazayaft ki jarhay hay tou lwdangh aspnr ko zaahar karnay kay l we ، hum aadad wa shmar ko lanay kay liye lwdangh ki haysayt ki haalt aur ywzafykt hak ki haalt ka antzaam karnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk rd aml kay jzaw ki ayk msaal hay jo ayk lwdangh aspnr ko zaahar krty hay jabky dayta ko haasal kya jarhaa haay: JSXIMPORT React ، {USESTATE ، 'ry aykt' sy 'ry aykt' sy draamd lwdar 'ry aykt-lwdar aspnr' sy ampwrt lwdar ؛ fnkshn daytadas play () {kanst [dayta [)، syt dayta] = usestate (null) ؛kanst [lwdangh ، syt lwdangh] = usestate (sch) ؛useeffect (() => {bazayaft ('https://example.com/api/data')) ؛}) ؛} ، []) ؛wapsy (
{lwdangh؟ul> {data.map ((aaitm ، andayks) => (
  • {aaitm}
    • ))}
    )} ) ؛} ) ؛}dayfalt daytadas play aykspwrt karain ؛ yeh jzaw dayta ki haalt aur lwdangh ki haysayt ko snbhalnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal krta haay۔jb jzaw brahta hay tou aadad wa shmar ko lanay kay liye ywsfykt hak ka astamal kya jata hay ، aur jab aadad wa shmar ko bazayaft kya jata hay tou yeh dayta aur lwdangh ki haysayt ki haalt ko ap dayt krta haay۔ jzaw phir ayk lwdangh aspnr ko ry aykt lwdar aspnr sy lwdar jzaw ka astamal karty hoey pysh krta haay۔laibryry jabky dayta haasal kya jarhaa haay۔ayk bar jab aadad wa shmar ki bazayaft hawjaty hay tou ، jzaw aadad wa shmar ko aadad wa shmar ki fharst kay tawr par aadad wa shmar ki fharst par tkrar karnay kay liye nkshha fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ghair mnzam fharst kay tawr par aadad wa shmar ko pysh krta haay۔aspnr lwda ho raha hay jabky dayta haasal kya jarhaa haay۔dawylprza is tknyk ko zayada pychydha ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo mkhtlf ksm kay farmyts main aadad wa shmar ko bazayaft aur dasplay krsktay hain aur saarf kay tjrbay ko brahanay kay liye mthark tsaawyr ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo mrzuy kay mtaabk mwad kay sath mwdal daaiylagh baks pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
rd aml main mwdal daaiylagh baks bnanay kay bohat sary tarykay hain ، aur is kam main mdd kay liye bohat sari laibryryan aur sbk dstyab hayn۔yhaan ayk rd aml kay jzaw ki ayk msaal hay jo mrzuy kay mtaabk mwad kay sath ayk mwdal daaiylagh baks pysh krty haay: JSximport ry aykt ، {USESTATE} sy 'ry aykt' ؛ fnkshn mwdal ({aaiswpyn ، aanklwza ، bchwn}) {kanst [ismodalopen ، setismodalopen] = usoptate (aaiswpyn]) ؛Const hayndalklwza = () => {sytzamwdaalwpyn (ghlta) ؛aanklwza () ؛} ؛wapsy (<> {ismodalopen && (
x {bchay}
)} ) ؛} dayfalt mwdal braamd karain ؛ yeh jzaw mwdal ki mriyt ki haalt ko snbhalnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal krta haay۔aaiswpyn prwp ko mwdal ki abtdaiy haalt kaim karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur aanklwza prwp ko mwdal ki bndsh ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jzaw phir mwdal klas aur mwdal-kantynt klas kay sath DIV tygh ka astamal karty hoey mwdal daaiylagh baks ko pysh krta haay۔chldarn prwp ko mwdal kay mwad ko pysh karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur kryby btn klas ko kryby btn ko astail karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh ayk sadha msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaya jaye jo hasb zurwrt mwad kay sath mwdal daaiylagh baks ko pysh krta haay۔dawylprza is tknyk ko mazeed pychydha ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo dayta ko mnzam karnay aur saarf kay sath taaml kay liye ryast ka astamal karty hayn۔bhat sari laibryrywn aur sbk dstyab hain jo rd aml main mwdal daaiylagh bks bnanay kay liye zayada jdyd khsawsayat aur faalyt fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo pchhlay aur aghlay btnwn kay sath tsaawyr ka slaida shw pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
yahan ayk rd aml kay jzaw ki ayk msaal hay jo pchhlay aur aghlay btnwn kay sath tsaawyr kay slaida shw ko pysh krty haay: JSximport rd aml ، '' ry aykt '' sy fnkshn slaiyda shw ({tsaawyr}) {Const [mwjwdha andayks ، syt krynt andayks] = usestate (0) ؛kwnt hayndal prwis = () => {sytkwrynt andayks (mwjwdha andayks === 0؟ amyjza۔ lmbaiy - 1: krnt andayks - 1) ؛} ؛const hayndalnykst = () => {sytkwrynt andayks (krnt andayks === amyjza۔ lmbaiy - 1؟ 0: krnt andayks + 1) ؛} ؛wapsy (
pchhla aghla Div>) ؛} braamd karain dayfalt slaiyda shw ؛ yeh jzaw slaida shw main mwjwdha amyj andayks ki haalt ka antzaam karnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal krta haay۔amyjza prwp ka astamal slaida shw kay liye tsaawyr ki fharst main pas karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ hayndal pryws aur hayndalnykst afaal ko jab is sy mtalk btnwn par klk kya jata hay ، aur woh mwjwdha amyj andayks ki haalt ko mwjwdha andayks haalt main kami ya braha kar ap dayt karty hayn۔as kay bad mwjwdha amyj yw aar ayl par syt ays aar sy wsaf kay sath aai aym jy tygh ka astamal karty hoey slaiyda shw main mwjwdha shbyhaha pysh krta haay۔yha slaida shw main pchhly aur aghly tsaawyr par tshryf la janay kay liye do btnwn ko bhi pysh krta haay۔ yeh ayk sadha msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaya jaye jo pchhlay aur aghlay btnwn kay sath tsaawyr kay slaida shw ko pysh krta haay۔dawylprza is tknyk ko mazeed pychydha ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo dayta ko mnzam karnay aur saarf kay sath taaml kay liye ryast ka astamal karty hayn۔bhat sari laibryrywn aur sbk dstyab hain jo amyj slaiydarza aur kyrwslza ko rd aml main bnanay kay liye zayada jdyd khsawsayat aur faalyt fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo srch un pt fylda dkhata hay aur tlash kay astfsar par mbny ashyaa ki fharst ko fltr krta haay۔
Answer:
ayk ry aykt jzaw bnanay kay l that jo srch un pt fylda ko dkhata hay aur tlash kay astfsar par mbny ashyaa ki fharst ko fltr krta hay ، hum tlash kay astfsar ki haalt aur fltr kay tarykha kar ko snbhalnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal krsktay hayn۔tlash kay astfsar.yhaan ayk rd aml kay jzaw ki ayk msaal hay jo tlash kay un pt fylda ko dkhata hay aur tlash kay astfsar par mbny ashyaa ki fharst ko fltr krta haay: JSximport ry aykt ، {USESTATE 'say' ry aykt '؛ fnkshn srch aybl lst ({aaitmza}) {CONST [SEECHERECHQUERY ، SEATCEARECHORY]= usestate ('') ؛Const hayndalysrch = (wakaha) => {syt srch kywiry (aywnt.tarjt.alyw) ؛} ؛ConstliTiTems = items.filter ((aaitm) => aaitm.twlwr kys () par mushtamil haay۔wapsy (
      {fltrda aaitmza.mp ((aaitm ، andayks) => ( {aaitm} ))}
) ؛ default pehlay sy taay shuda srch aybl lst braamd karain ؛ yeh jzaw tlash kay astfsar ki haalt ko snbhalnay kay liye yw ays astyt hak ka astamal krta haay۔aaitmza prwp ko tlash kay kabl fharst kay l items aaitmza ki fharst main mntkl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab srch un pt fylda tbdyl hawjata hay tou hayndalysrch fnkshn kaha jata hay ، aur yeh srch kwiry ryast ko tlash ki kymt par trtyb dy kar tlash kay astfsar ki haalt ko ap dayt krta haay۔an pt fylda۔ jzaw phir fltr kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey tlash kay astfsar par mbny ashyaa ki fharst ko fltr krta hay aur is main shaml karnay ka tarykha chyk karnay ka tarykha hay keh aya is shay main tlash ki astfsar shaml hay ya nhayn۔as kay bad yeh aaitmza ki fltr shuda fharst ko ghair mnzam fharst kay tawr par pysh krta hay js main nkshha fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey aaitmza ki fharst main azuafha hawta hay aur hr aaitm ko fharst kay aaitm kay tawr par pysh krta haay۔ yeh ayk sadha msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk rd aml ka jzaw tshkyl diya jaye jo srch un pt fylda ko zaahar krta haay۔awr tlash kay astfsar par mbny ashyaa ki ayk fharst fltr krta haay۔dawylprza is tknyk ko mazeed pychydha ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo dayta ko mnzam karnay aur saarf kay sath taaml kay liye ryast ka astamal karty hayn۔bhat sari laibryryan aur sbk dstyab hain jo ry aykt main tlash aur fltr ajzaaa bnanay kay liye zayada jdyd khsawsayat aur faalyt fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo klk karnay kay kabl lnks kay sath nywyghyshn bar pysh krta haay۔
Answer: yahan ayk ry aykt jzaw ki ayk msaal hay jo ry aykt rwtr-dawm laibryry ka astamal karty hoey klk karnay waly lnks kay sath nywyghyshn bar pysh krty haay: 'ry aykt' sy JSXIMPORT rd aml ؛ draamd {NAVLINK} 'ry aykt-rwtr-dawm' sy fnkshn nywyghyshn bar () {wapsy.li> rabtaha ) ؛ default dayfalt nywyghyshn bar ko braamd kryn۔nywyghyshn bar main klk karnay kay kabl lnks pysh kryn۔ayn mtaabk shaara denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh lnk sirf is sawrt main faal hona chahaiay jab mwjwdha yw aar ayl lnk yw aar ayl sy balkl mmasal haw۔ jzaw phir nywyghyshn bar ko yw ayl tygh ka astamal karty hoey ghair mnzam fharst kay tawr par pysh krta hay aur lnk ki fharst main tkrar karnay kay liye nkshha fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔awr hr lnk ko li tygh ka astamal karty hoey lst aaitm kay tawr par pysh kryn۔ yeh ayk sadha sy msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaya jaye jo klk karnay kay kabl lnks kay sath nywyghyshn bar ko pysh krta haay۔dawylprza is tknyk ko mazeed pychydha ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo dayta ko mnzam karnay aur saarf kay sath taaml kay liye ryast ka astamal karty hayn۔bhat sari laibryryan aur sbk dstyab hain jo ry aykt main nywyghyshn bar aur mynwza bnanay kay liye zayada jdyd khsawsayat aur faalyt fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo twsya aur khatmay ki faalyt kay sath ayk twt phwt ka pynl dkhata haay۔
Answer:
ry aykt main twt phwt kay kabl pynl bnanay kay bohat sary tarykay hain ، aur is kam main mdd kay liye bohat sari laibryryan aur sbk dstyab hayn۔yhaan ayk rd aml kay jzaw ki ayk msaal hay jo twsya aur khatmay ki faalyt kay sath ayk khatmha pynl ko zaahar krty haay: 'rd aml' sy jsxport ry aykt ، {usestate} fnkshn kwlpsblpynyl ({anwan ، bchwn}) {const [iscollapsed ، sytskwlpsda] = usestate (sch)؛Const hayndalytghl = () => {sytskwlapsda (! iscollapsed) ؛} ؛wapsy (
{anwan} {iscollapsed؟&&
{bchay}
}
) ؛} dayfalt kwlpsblpynyl braamd kryn۔ yeh jzaw ghrnay waly pynl ki mriyt ki haalt ka antzaam karnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal krta haay۔anwan aur bchwn kay prps ko twt janay waly pynl kay anwan aur mshmwlat main ghzarnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jab hayndaltghl fnkshn ko kal kya jata hay jab kala pynl kay btn par klk kya jata hay ، aur is main asklwpyda haalt ko twghl krkay twt phwt kay pynl ki haalt ko ap dayt kya jata haay۔btn tygh ka astamal karty hoey btn tygh ka astamal karty hoey btn tygh ka astamal karty hoey btn kay mtn aur aaiykn ka tayn karnay kay liye twt jata haay۔yha bchwn kay shaaray aur askwlpda ryast kay sath DIV tygh ka astamal karty hoey twt janay waly pynl kay mwad ko bhi pysh krta hay takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh mwad ko zaahar karna chahaiay۔dawylprza is tknyk ko mazeed pychydha ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo dayta ko mnzam karnay aur saarf kay sath taaml kay liye ryast ka astamal karty hayn۔bhat sari laibryryan aur sbk dstyab hain jo ry aykt main ghrnay waly pynl aur aykardaynza bnanay kay liye zayada jdyd khsawsayat aur faalyt fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo ayk prwghrys bar ko hasb zurwrt kymt kay sath pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnanay kay l that jo ayk tkhsaysa bkhsh kymt kay sath prwghrys bar ko pysh krta hay ، hum pyshrft ki kymt ki haalt aur astail wsaf ki haalt ko snbhalnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal krsktay hain takha prwghrys bar ki chwraaiy taay ki jaskay۔yhaan ayk rd aml kay jzaw ki ayk msaal hay jo ayk prwghrys bar ko ayk tkhsaysa bkhsh kymt kay sath pysh krty haay: JSximport ry aykt ، 'react' sy 'React' ؛ fnkshn prwghrys bar ({wylyw}) {Const [prwghrys wylyw ، syt prwghrys wylyw] = usestate (value) ؛kwnt hayndal ankryza = () => {syt prwghrys wylyw (trky wylyw + 10) ؛} ؛Const hayndallyda kryza = () => {syt prwghrys wylyw (pyshrft wylyw - 10) ؛} ؛wapsy (
{prwghrys wylyw} ٪
- +
) ؛} dayfalt prwghrys bar ko braamd karain ؛ yeh jzaw pyshrft ki kymt ki haalt ka antzaam karnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal krta haay۔wylyw prwp ka astamal pyshrft ki kymt ki abtdaiy haalt ko taay karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ hayndal ankryza aur hayndallyda kryza kay afaal ko is wkt kaha jata hay jab mtalkha btnwn par klk kya jata hay ، aur woh trky ki kymt main azuafha ya kami kay zaryaha pyshrft ki kymt ki haalt ko ap dayt karty hayn۔ is kay bad jzaw pysh krta haay۔prwghrys bar klas aur prwghrys wylyw ki chwraaiy kay mtaabk astail wsaf kay sath dayw tygh ka astamal karty hoey prwghrys bar۔yha pyshrft ki kymt ko brahanay aur kam karnay kay liye do btnwn ko bhi pysh krta haay۔ yeh ayk sadha msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk rd aml ka jzaw tshkyl diya jaye jo ayk tkhsaysa bkhsh kymt kay sath pyshrft bar ko pysh krta haay۔dawylprza is tknyk ko mazeed pychydha ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo dayta ko mnzam karnay aur saarf kay sath taaml kay liye ryast ka astamal karty hayn۔bhat sari laibryryan aur sbk dstyab hain jo rd aml main trky bar aur lwdarza bnanay kay liye zayada jdyd khsawsayat aur faalyt fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo mntkhb shuda tarykhwn kay sath kylndar dkhata haay۔
Answer:
ayk ry aykt jzaw bnanay kay l that jo mntkhb shuda tarykhwn kay sath kylndar dkhata hay ، hum bohat sy dstyab laibryrywn main sy ayk astamal krsktay hain jo astamal main aasan ، tkhsaysa bkhsh aur mstkl tarykh chnnay waly ko rd aml kay l. mhaya krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch mshhawr laibryryan hain jn ka astamal tarykh kay chnnay waly jzaw bnanay kay liye kya jaskta haay: rd aml ki tarykh ka antkhab karnay wala: yeh laibryry rd aml kay l a ayk sadha aur tkhsaysa bkhsh tarykh chnnay wala jzaw fraham krty haay۔as sy saarfyn ko kesi kylndar sy braha rast kesi farm fylda main tarykh ka antkhab karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، bjaiay is kay keh woh tarykh ko dsty tawr par taip kryn۔yha tarykh athanay waly kylndar main mkhtlf astail aur khsawsayat fraham krta haay۔aap sy ays ays ya sy ays ays frym wrk ka astamal karty hoey apni mrzuy kay mtaabk astail ko bhi shaml krsktay hain jesay tyl wnda ۔1 aar aay sy ty-kylndar: yeh laibryry faalyt mhaya krty hay jo aap ko tarykh aur wkt ko jwra twra aur antzaam karnay main mdd dyty haay۔yha akhttamy saarfyn ko ayk dn ، mhaynha ، ya ayk sal ka antkhab karnay ki salahayt fraham krta haay۔yha saarfyn ko kylndar main tarykh ki had ka antkhab karnay ki bhi ajazat dyta haay۔yha saarfyn ko mtadd tarykhwn ka antkhab karnay ، mntkhb awkat ko zaahar karnay ، mstkbl ki tarykhwn ko ghair faal karnay ، aur tarykh kay antkhab ko saaf karnay ki bhi ajazat dyta haay۔ un laibryrywn main sy kesi ko bhi astamal karnay kay l you ، aap inhain NPM ya swt ka astamal karty hoey anstal krsktay hain aur phir inhain apnay ry aykt jzaw main draamd krsktay hayn۔as kay bad aap ayk tarykh kay chnnay waly jzaw bnanay kay liye fraham krdha ajzaaa aur APIs ka astamal krsktay hain jo aap ki zurwryat kay mtaabk haay۔ yahan tarykh kay chnnay waly ka jzaw bnanay kay liye ry aykt dayt-pykr laibryry ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: JSximport React ، {USESTATE 'say' ry aykt ''' 'ry aykt-tarykh-pkykr' sy tarykh ka tarykh pykr ؛ fnkshn dayts alyktrk () {const [mntkhb krdha dayt ، syt slyktda dayt] = usestate (niy tarykh ()) ؛const handledatechange = (tarykh) => {syt slyktda dayt (tarykh) ؛} ؛wapsy (

ayk tarykh mntkhb kryn:

) ؛} braamdy dayfalt dayts alyktrk ؛ is jzaw ka antzaam karnay kay liye yeh jzaw astamal krta haaymntkhb krdha tarykh ki haalt۔ry aykt dayt-pykr laibryry sy dayt pykr jzaw tarykh chnnay waly ko pysh karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔wylyw prwp ka astamal tarykh chnnay waly ki abtdaiy kymt ko mntkhb tarykh par taay karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، aur aan chynj prwp ko mntkhb krdha tarykh main tbdylywn ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh ayk sadha msaal hay keh ayk ry aykt jzaw bnanay ka tarykha hay jo kylndar ko dkhata haay۔ry aykt-tarykh athanay waly laibryry ka astamal karty hoey mntkhb tarykhyn۔dawylprza is tknyk ko zayada pychydha ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo dayta ko mnzam karnay aur saarf kay sath bat chyt karnay kay liye ryast ka astamal karty hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo mtadd mwad kay hasawn kay sath tybda antrfys pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
rd aml main tybda antrfys bnanay kay bohat sary tarykay hain ، aur is kam main mdd kay liye bohat sari laibryryan aur sbk dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch mshhawr laibryryan hain jn ka astamal tyb antrfys jzaw bnanay kay liye kya jaskta haay: rd aml tybza: yeh laibryry rd aml kay l a ayk aasan aur tkhsaysa bkhsh tybda antrfys jzaw fraham krty haay۔yha saarfyn ko mtalkha tyb par klk krkay mkhtlf mwad kay hasawn kay mabyn swich karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha tyb antrfys main mkhtlf astail aur khsawsayat fraham krta haay۔aap sy ays ays ya sy ays ays frym wrk ka astamal karty hoey apni mrzuy kay mtaabk astail ko shaml krsktay hain jesay tyl wnda 1 chychra yw: yeh laibryry ayk tyb jza fraham krty hay jo aap ko kabl rsaiy tybza bnanay main mdd krty hay ، js main waiy ayrya tyb pynl dayzaain pytrn main byan krdha ki bwrda ki bat chyt aur aay aar aai aay ki khsawsayat fraham ki jaskty hayn۔yha tybda antrfys main mkhtlf astail aur khsawsayat bhi mhaya krta haay۔ un laibryrywn main sy kesi ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap inhain NPM ya swt ka astamal krkay anstal krsktay hain aur phir inhain apnay rd aml kay jzaw main draamd krsktay hayn۔as kay bad aap tybda antrfys jzaw bnanay kay liye fraham krdha ajzaaa aur APIs ka astamal krsktay hain jo aap ki zurwryat kay mtaabk haay۔ yahan tybda antrfys jzaw bnanay kay liye ry aykt tybza laibryry ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: 'ry aykt' sy jsxport rd aml ؛ draamd {tyb ،tybza ، tyblst ، tybpynyl} sy 'ry aykt tybza' sy ampwrt karain 'rd aml tybza/astail/ry aykt tybs sy ays ays' ؛ fnkshn tybda antrfys () {rytrn ( tyb 1 tyb 2 tyb 3

tyb 1 kay liye mwad

yeh tyb 1 kay liye mwad haay۔

tyb 2 kay liye mwad

yeh tyb 2 kay liye mwad haay۔H2>

yeh tyb 3 kay liye mwad haay۔tybda antrfys pysh karnay kay liye laibryry۔tyblst jzaw ko tybza ki fharst pysh karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur tybpnyl jzaw hr tyb kay liye mwad ko pysh karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yeh ayk sadha msaal hay keh rd aml ka astamal karty hoey ayk ry aykt jzaw bnanay kay liye keh ayk rd aml ka jzaw kesay bnaya jaiay۔-tybs laibryry۔dawylprza is tknyk ko zayada pychydha ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo dayta ko snbhalnay aur saarf kay sath bat chyt karnay kay liye ryast ka astamal karty hayn۔

Question: ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karain jo tsaawyr ki zamha dar ghrda la aaؤt pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
rd aml main tsaawyr ki zamha dar ghrda la aaؤt bnanay kay bohat sary tarykay hain ، aur is kam main mdd kay liye bohat sari laibryryan aur sbk dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch mshhawr laibryryan hain jn ka astamal tsaawyr ki zamha dar ghrda la aaؤt bnanay kay liye kya jaskta haay: ry aykt-ghrda li aaؤt: yeh laibryry rd aml kay l a ayk ghrda la aaؤt sstm mhaya krty hay jo zamha dar hay aur bryk pwaint ki hamayt krty haay۔as sy saarfyn ko tsaawyr ka ayk ghrda la aaؤt bnanay ki ajazat mlty hay jsay askryn kay saiza ki bnyad par saiza ka saiza aur dwbarha trtyb diya jaskta haay۔yha saarfyn ko mkhtlf saiza aur phalw tnasb kay sath tsaawyr ka ghrda la aaؤt bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔as sy saarfyn ko mkhtlf saiza aur phalw tnasb kay sath tsaawyr ka ayk ghrda la aaؤt bnanay ki ajazat mlty hay ، aur is main sy ays ays ghrda ka astamal trtyb pyda karnay kay liye kya jata hay ۔3 un laibryrywn main sy kesi ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap inhain ayn py aym ya swt ka astamal krkay anstal krsktay hain aur phir inhain apnay rd aml kay jzaw main draamd krsktay hayn۔as kay bad aap fraham krdha ajzaaa aur APIs ka astamal un tsaawyr ka ayk zamha dar ghrda la aaؤt bnanay kay liye krsktay hain jo aap ki zurwryat kay mtaabk hayn۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh tsaawyr ka jwabdha ghrda la aaؤt bnanay kay liye ry aykt-fwtw-ghylry laibryry ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: 'rd aml''' 'ry aykt-fwtw-ghylry' sy ampwrt ghylry ، ngharkhanha ؛ fnkshn amyjghryda () {knt fwtw = [{src: 'https://picsum.photos/id/1018/1000/600/' ، chwraaiy: 4 ، awnchaiy:3} ، {src: 'https://picsum.photos/id/1015/1000/600/' ، chwraaiy: 1 ، awnchaiy: 1} ، {src: 'https://picsum.photos/id/1019/1000/600/'، chwraaiy: 3 ، awnchaiy: 4}] ؛wapsy (

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo hasb zurwrt astart aur akhttamy awkat kay sath alty ghnty taimr dkhata haay۔
Answer:

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo darygh aybl aur ryjaiza aybl ansar pysh krta haay۔
Answer:

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo saarf nam aur pas wrda kay fyldaza ki twsayk kay sath lagh un farm dkhata haay۔
Answer:
yahan ayk rd aml kay jzaw ki ayk msaal hay jo saarf nam aur pas wrda kay shabwn ki twsayk kay sath lagh un farm ko zaahar krty haay: JSximport rd aml ، {USESTATE} sy "ry aykt" ؛ fnkshn lagh anfarm () {CONST [saarf nam ، sytsr nam] = usestate ("") ؛kanst [pas wrda ، syt pas wrda] = usestate ("") ؛kanst [saarf namyrr ، sytsrnamyirr] = usestate ("") ؛kanst [pas wrdarr ، syt pas wrdarr] = usestate ("") ؛const handlesubmit = (wakaha) => {aywnt.prwynt dayfalt () ؛aghr (saarf nam === "") {setUsernameError ("saarf nam ki zurwrt haay") ؛} if (pas wrda === "") {syt paswrdarr ("pas wrda ki zurwrt haay") ؛} // yahan lagh un mntak prfarm kryn} ؛wapsy (
saarf nam: setusername (e.target.value)}/> {saarf nam ki shkl && {saarf namyrr} }
pas wrda: syt pas wrda (e.target.value)}/> {paswrdarwr && {pas wrdarr} } lagh un ) ؛ Default dayfalt lagh anfarm braamd karain ؛ yeh jzaw saarf nam aur pas wrda kay fyldaza ki haalt ka antzaam karnay kay liye USESTATE hak ka astamal krta hay ، nyza ghltay kay pyghamat kay liye bhyhar fyldajb farm jma kraya jata hay tou ، hayndalyswbyt fnkshn ko kaha jata hay ، kon sa chyk krta hay keh agar saarf nam aur pas wrda kay fyldaza khaly hain aur agar woh hain tou is sy mtalkha ghltay kay pyghamat mrtb karty hayn۔lagh un mntak ko bhi hayndalyswbmyt fnkshn main anjam diya jaskta haay۔ lybl anasar HTMLFOR wsaf ka astamal karty hoey un kay mtalkha un pt anasar sy wabstha hayn۔jb un pt ansar ki twjha mrkwza ki jati hay tou is sy askryn kay kariyn ko lybl ko prahnay ki ajazat dy kar rsai ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔ yeh sirf ayk msaal hay keh rd aml main twsayk kay sath lagh un farm bnanay ka tarykha۔as ko haasal karnay kay bohat sary aur tarykay hain ، aur is par aml draamd mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk mkhtlf hawskta haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo ayk API sy bhry hui akhtyarat kay sath darap daaؤn slykt fylda pysh krta haay۔
Answer: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnanay kay l that jo kesi API sy bhry hui akhtyarat kay sath ayk darap daaؤn slykt fylda pysh krta hay ، hum ry aykt slykt laibryry ka astamal krsktay hain ، jo API12 sy ghair mtzalzal akhtyarat ko ghair mtzalzal tawr par lwda karnay kay liye mdd kay sath REACTJs kay lchkdar aur hasb zurwrt mntkhb un pt kntrwl fraham krta haay۔yhaan API sy bhry hui akhtyarat kay sath darap daaؤn slykt fylda bnanay kay liye ry aykt slykt ko kis tarah astamal karain is ki ayk msaal haay: jsximport ry aykt ، {ywstyt ، "ry aykt" sy USEEFFECT} "React-Select" sy mntkhb kryn۔ fnkshn darap daaؤn slykt () {{kanst [aapshnza ، syt apshnza] = usestate ([]) ؛useeffect (() => {// akhtyarat bazayaft karnay kay liye API kal karain ("https://example.com/api/options")) => {// aadad wa shmar ko akhtyarat main tbdyl kryn؛}). kych ((ghltay) => knswl.lagh (ghltay)) ؛} ، []) ؛wapsy (<mntkhb aapshnza = {akhtyarat} />) ؛} braamd karain dayfalt darap daaؤn slykt ؛ is msaal main ، hum akhtyarat ki saf ki haalt ka antzaam karnay kay liye ywsstyt hak ka astamal karty hain ، jo API sy haasal krdha akhtyarat kay sath aabad hawgha۔ham API kal karnay aur rdaml kay aadad wa shmar ko akhtyarat ki ayk saf main tbdyl karnay kay liye USEEFECT hak ka astamal karty hain ، jsay hum is kay bad akhtyarat kay mtghyr ki haalt kay tawr par mrtb karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum rd aml kay antkhab sy mntkhb jzaw ko pysh karty hain ، akhtyarat ki srny ko ayk prwpy kay tawr par mnzawr karty hayn۔ nwt karain keh yeh sirf ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk API sy bhry hui aapshnza kay sath darap daaؤn slykt fylda tshkyl diya jaiay۔as ko haasal karnay kay bohat sary aur tarykay hain ، aur is mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk aml draamd mkhtlf hawskta haay۔dwsray wsail jesay AS3456 may azuafy bsayrt aur msaalyn fraham karty hain

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo aaitmza ki fharst kay zaryaay tshryf la janay kay liye safhaha bndy kntrwl ko zaahar krta haay۔
Answer:
aaitmza ki fharst kay zaryaay nywyghyt karnay kay liye ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karnay kay liye ، hum dstyab bohat sy rd aml pyjynyshn laibryrywn main sy ayk astamal krsktay hain ، jesay ry aykt pyjynyt 1 ، ry aykt-jay ays-pyjynyshn 2 ، ya aar sy pyghynyshn 3۔yha laibryryan kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn main safhaha bndy ko shaml karnay ka ayk aasan aur tkhsaysa karnay wala tarykha fraham krty hayn۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah ry aykt pyjynt laibryry ko safhaha bndy ka kntrwl bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaiay: JSximport ry aykt ، {usestate ، "ry aykt" sy import draamd ry aykt pyjynyt"ry aykt pyjynt" ؛ fnkshn pyjynyshn () {kanst [dayta ، syt dayta] = ywstytyt ([]) ؛Const [pagenumber ، setPagenumber] = usestate (0) ؛kanst aaitmzapr pyj = 10 ؛const pagesvised = pagenumber * itemppage ؛useeffect (() => {// dayta bazayaft karnay kay liye API kal karain ("https://example.com/api/data")) => {// dayta astyt syt dayta (dayta) ؛}). kych ((ghltay) => knswl.lagh (ghltay)) ؛} ، []) ؛kanst dasplay dayta = dayta. slais (pyjza wyzatda ، pyjza wyzada + aaitmzapr pyj)Const pagecount = math.ceil (data.length / itemsperpage) ؛CONST CONSEPAGE = ({mntkhb}) => {setPagenumber (mntkhb) ؛} ؛wapsy (
{dasplay daata}
) ؛} braamd dayfalt pyjynyshn ؛ is msaal main ، hum ywstyt hak ka astamal karty hayn۔dayta srny aur mwjwdha safhaha nmbr ki haalt ka nzam kryn۔ham API kal karnay aur dayta astyt ko mrtb karnay kay liye ywsfykt hak ka astamal karty hayn۔as kay bad hum mwjwdha safhaay kay liye sirf aaitmza ko zaahar karnay kay liye slais ka tarykha astamal karty hain ، aur hr aaitm ko btawr dawy ansar pysh karnay kay liye nkshha ka tarykha kar۔ry aykt pyjynt jzaw۔ham aan pyj chynj prwp ko bhi kal byk fnkshn mntkl karty hain ، jo pyj nmbr ki haalt ko ap dayt krta hay jab saarf kesi safhaay nmbr par klk krta haay۔rd aml main ayk safhaha bndy ka kntrwl۔as ko haasal karnay kay bohat sary aur tarykay hain ، aur is mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk aml draamd mkhtlf hawskta haay۔dwsray wsail jesay 456 may azuafy bsayrt aur msaalyn fraham karty hain

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo dayta wyzenaizayshn laibryry ka astamal karty hoey chart ya ghraf dkhata haay۔
Answer: bohat sy rd aml dayta wyzenaizayshn laibryry dstyab hain jo chart aur ghraf bnanay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn۔kchh mkbwl afrad yeh hayn: ry aykt wyza: aam aadad wa shmar kay tsawr kay chart ، jesay lain/ayrya/bar chart ، ghrmy kay nkshay ، skrytrplts ، kwntwr plat ، msds hayt myp ، paiy aur dawnt chart ، snbrsts ، pysh karnay kay liye rd aml kay ajzaaa ka ayk mjmwaha ،rydaar chart ، mtwazay kwaardaynyt ، aur drkhtwn kay nkshay۔yha astamal karna aasan hay aur dayfalts ka ayk syt fraham krta hay jsay kstm saarf ki trtybat kay zaryaha zayr kya jaskta haay۔yha un ayply kyshnza kay liye chart la aaؤt par aaly staha par kabw palya jata hay jn ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ REACT-CHARTJS-2: chart daat jay ays 2 kay liye ayk rypr ، ayk mshhawr awpn swrs chartngh laibryry۔yha hasb zurwrt kay wsya rynj kay sath chart aur ghraf bnanay ka ayk aasan aur bdyhay tarykha fraham krta haay۔ rycharts: day 3 sbdawdawls par halkay anhasaar kay sath ays wy jy anasar par tamyr krdha ayk kmpwza aybl chartngh laibryry۔chart aasany sy daykplda ، dwbarha astamal kay kabl rd aml kay ajzaaa sy bnaiay jatay hayn۔an charts ko prps ko tbdyl krkay aur dayta main pas krkay apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnaya jaskta haay۔yha chartngh ajzaaa kay sath aata hay aur tamam ayply kyshnza kay liye yksan API astamal krta haay۔ayk jesi API dawylprza ko aai aw ays aur ayndarwiyda ayply kyshnza kay liye dayta ko chart main tbdyl karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔as kay alawha ، yeh kras plyt farm chartngh ki hamayt krta hay aur astamal karna aasan haay۔ wyzar: tyn anthaaiy mkbwl frym wrk kay liye ayk zahayn bsary laibryry - rd aml ، wyw aur kwnyy۔as main dyghr laibryrywn kay mkablay main ayk chhwta sa saarf adaha hay lekin yeh chartngh kay akhtyarat aur tkhsaysa ki khsawsayat ki ayk wsya rynj mhaya krta haay۔ yeh laibryryan kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn main dayta wyzenaizayshn ko shaml karnay ka ayk aasan aur hasb zurwrt tarykha fraham krty hayn۔laibryry ka antkhab prwjykt ki mkhsawsa zurwryat ، tkhsaysa ki staha ، aur saarf ki bnyad kay saiza par mnhasar hawskta haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo apni mrzuy kay mtaabk shbyhayn aur antrayktw hawwr asarat kay sath drjha bndy ka nzaam dkhata haay۔
Answer: bohat sari ry aykt laibryryan hain jn ko hasb zurwrt shbyhayn aur antrayktw hawwr asarat kay sath drjha bndy ka nzaam bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: rd aml aasan astar ki drjha bndy: yeh aap ki drkhwast main amdha drjha bndy kay shbyhayn shaml karnay kay liye ayk aasan lekin taaktwr rd aml ka jzaw haay۔yha aap ko bhray hoey shbyhayn par hawwr asar ko faal/ghyr faal karnay aur kstm fl aaiykn ays wy jy .1 mytryl-yw aai ka astamal karnay ki ajazat dyta haay: yeh ayk mshhawr ry aykt UI laibryry hay jo blt main prwps kay sath drjha bndy ka jzaw fraham krty hay jo saiza ، rngh ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye astamal ki jaskty haay۔، aur drjha bndy kay nzaam kay shbyhayn۔yha saarf ko sahayha drjha bndy ki kymt ka antkhab karnay main mdd kay liye hawwr aaraa bhi fraham krta hay ۔33RECT- drjha bndy: yeh ayk safr par anhasaar hay ، jo rd aml kay l highly anthaaiy hasb zurwrt drjha bndy ka jzaw haay۔yha aap ko kesi bhi ays wy jy ko astamal karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، is ki tkhsaysa kay lamtnahay amkanat hain ، aur yeh kabl rsaiy ko mdnzar rkhtay hoey bnaya gaya haay۔yha ayk mrdha sadha fy ayktw aaitm astail bhi mhaya krta hay aur wakata responsive jwabdha aur mwbail frst 4 dablyw 3 dablyw 3 klyktw haay: yeh ayk tywtwryl hay keh kesi azuafy anhasaar ya laibryrywn ki zurwrt kay baghair kstm ry aykt astar rytngh jzaw ki tshkyl kesay ki jaiay۔yha astyt hak ka astamal astar ki kymt ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal krta hay aur is main "aan" ya "aaf" ki klas shaml krta hay takha shbyhayn ko astail kya jaskay takha mntkhb krdha drjha bndy ki bsary nmaindghy ki jaskay۔rd aml main hasb zurwrt shbyhayn aur antrayktw hawwr asarat kay sath drjha bndy ka nzaam bnanay kay liay۔as ko haasal karnay kay bohat sary aur tarykay hain ، aur is mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk aml draamd mkhtlf hawskta haay۔dwsray wsail jesay AS6may azuafy bsayrt aur msaalyn fraham karty hain
