Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo ayk ksayr staha kay aykardayn mynw ko twsya aur ghrnay ki faalyt kay sath pysh krta haay۔
ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo mrzuy kay mtaabk akdamat aur shylywn kay sath mlty mrhalha kay aml kay liye pyshrft kay asharay ko zaahar krta haay۔
Answer: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnanay ka ayk aapshn jo mrzuy kay mtaabk akdamat aur astail kay sath mlty mrhalha kay aml kay liye pyshrft kay asharay ko zaahar krta hay woh yeh hay keh rd aml mrhalha war laibryry 12 ka astamal kryn۔yha laibryry kesi rd aml ki ayply kyshn main hasb zurwrt akdamat aur astail kay sath pyshrft kay asharay ko shaml karnay ka ayk aasan aur tkhsaysa bkhsh tarykha fraham krty haay۔ ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah sy ayk mlty mrhalha prwghrys laibryry ko astamal kya jaye takha ayk ksayr aljhaty aml kay liye trky kay asharay ko kstmaiza aybl bnaya jaskay۔akdamat aur astail: "rd aml" sy jsixmport ka rd aml ؛ draamd {prwghrys bar ، "rd aml mrhalha-pyshrft-bar" sy mrhalha} draamd "rd aml" mrhalha war-pyshrft bar/astails sy ays ays "؛ fnkshn pyshrft ({astyps ، krnt astp ، krnt astp)}) {wapsy ( {mrhalha.label} )} ))} ) ؛} braamd dayfalt prwghrys andaykytr ؛ is msaal main ، hum prwghrys bar ka astamal karty hayn۔awr hasb zurwrt akdamat aur aslwb kay sath mlty mrhalha aml kay l a pyshrft asharay bnanay kay l reac rd aml sy mtalk pyshrft sy mrhalha waly ajzaaa۔ham apni mrzuy kay mtaabk akhtyarat jesay lybl kay sath zaahar hony waly akdamat ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ hum trky kay asharay ko fysad ، bhray byk ghraؤnda ، mntkly aur kabl prwps kay sath pysh karty hain ، jo apni mrzuy kay mtaabk akhtyarat aur astail kay sath pyshrft kay asharay ko zaahar kray gha۔ nwt karain keh yeh sirf ayk haay۔ayk ksayr aljhaty aml kay liye trky kay asharay ko kis tarah tyar kya jaye is ki msaal kay tawr par kstm aybl akdamat aur astailza kay sath rd aml ka astamal karty hoey rd aml ka astamal karty hawiay۔as ko haasal karnay kay bohat sary aur tarykay hain ، aur is mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk aml draamd mkhtlf hawskta haay۔dwsray wsail jesay 123456 may azuafy bsayrt aur msaalyn fraham karty hain

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo thmb nylza aur lait baks faalyt kay sath ayk zamha dar amyj ghylry dkhata haay۔
Answer: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnanay kay l that jo thmb nylza aur lait baks faalyt kay sath ayk zamha dar amyj ghylry dkhata hay ، hamary pas mtadd akhtyarat dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch akhtyarat hayn: ry aykt-ghrda ghylry laibryry 1 ka astamal kryn: yeh rd aml kay l a ayk anthaaiy hasb zurwrt aur lchkdar amyj ghylry ka jzaw haay۔yha zamha dar amyj ghrda ، thmb nylza ، aur lait baks faalyt ki hamayt krta haay۔yha tkhsaysa kay akhtyarat ki ayk wsya rynj bhi mhaya krta hay jesay kypshn ، tsawyry antkhab ، aur kstm amyj kay ajzaaa۔ ry aykt fwtw ghylry laibryry 23 ka astamal kryn: yeh rd aml kay liye ayk sadha aur halka phlka tsawyry ghylry ka jzaw haay۔yha zamha dar amyj ghrda ، thmb nylza ، aur lait baks faalyt ki hamayt krta haay۔yha tkhsaysa kay kuch akhtyarat jesay kypshnza aur kstm amyj kay ajzaaa bhi mhaya krta haay۔ ry aykt kay blt un tarykwn 45 ka astamal karty hoey kstm par aml draamd kryn: is main ry aykt kay blt un tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey skrych sy ayk amyj ghylry bnana shaml haay۔yha ayk aysa jzaw tshkyl dy kar kya jaskta hay js main mkhtlf hasb zurwrt kay akhtyarat shaml hon jesay amyj ghrda la aaؤt ، thmb nylza ، aur lait baks fnkshnlty۔ nwt karain keh yeh sirf kuch akhtyarat hain jo ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karnay kay liye dstyab hain jo thmb nylwn kay sath ayk zamha dar amyj ghylry dkhata hay awrlait baks faalyt۔as mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk aml draamd mkhtlf hawskta haay۔dwsray wsail jesay AS642531 may azuafy bsayrt aur msaalyn fraham karty hain

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo sst lwdangh aur lamhadwd skrwlngh wali ashyaa ki ayk askrwl kabl fharst pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
ayk ry aykt jzaw bnanay kay l that jo sst lwdangh aur lamhadwd skrwlngh wali ashyaa ki ayk askrwl kabl fharst pysh krta hay ، hum dstyab bohat sy wsail main sy ayk astamal krsktay hain ، jesay ry aykt-sst lwdangh anfainyt skrwl laibryry 1۔yha laibryry kesi rd aml ki ayply kyshn main sst lwdangh aur lamhadwd skrwlngh kay sath aaitmza ki ayk skrwl kabl fharst shaml karnay ka ayk aasan aur hasb zurwrt tarykha mhaya krty haay۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk skrwlbl lst bnanay kay liye ry aykt-sst-lwdangh anfainyt skrwl laibryry ko astamal kya jaiay۔sst lwdangh aur lamhadwd skrwlngh wali ashya: jsximport ry aykt ، {usestate ، "rd aml" sy useefect} "Axios" sy Axios draamd karain ؛ "ry aykt-sst-lwdangh anfaint-skrwl" sy anfynyt krwl draamd karain ؛ fnkshn ki fharst () {kanst [)safhaha ، syt pyj] = usestate (1) ؛kanst [dayta ، syt dayta] = usestate ([]) ؛useeffect (() => {axios .get (`https://randomuser.me/api/؟page=$ {safhaha} aur ntaij = 10`). phir (jwab) => {syt dayta ([... dayta، ... rspans۔ dayta۔kans lwdawr = () => {syt pyj (safhaha + 1) ؛} ؛wapsy ( lwdangh ... }> {dayta.aymp ((aaitm ، andayks) => (((aaitm ، andayks) => ((aaitm ، andayks)

Question: ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karain jo mthark mwad kay sath darygh aybl aur ryj aybl ghrda la aaؤt ko zaahar krta haay۔
Answer:
mthark mwad kay sath darygh aybl aur ryj aybl ghrda la aaؤt ko zaahar karnay waly ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum dstyab bohat sy wsail main sy ayk astamal krsktay hain ، jesay ry aykt-ghrda-ly aaؤt laibryry 12345۔yha laibryry ayk ry aykt ayply kyshn main mthark mwad kay sath darygh aybl aur rysaiza aybl ghrda la aaؤt ko shaml karnay ka ayk aasan aur tkhsaysa bkhsh tarykha fraham krty haay۔ yahan mthark mwad kay sath darygh aybl aur ry rysaizangh ghrda la aaؤt bnanay kay liye ry aykt-ghrda lyt aaؤt laibryry ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay:"rd aml" sy jsximport rd aml ، {usestate} draamd {zamha dar ، chwraaiy prwwydar} sy "ry aykt-ghrda-ly aaؤt" ؛ draamd "ry aykt-ghrda-ly aaؤt/sy ays ays/astails sy ays ays" ؛ draamd "rd aml/sy ays ays/astailza.css "؛ Const responsivegridlayout = chwraaiy prwprwaidar (zamha dar) ؛ fnkshn ghrda ({aaitmza}) {const [trtyb ، syt laؤ aaؤt] = usestate ({lg: []}) ؛kant onlayoutchange = (trtyb ، trtyb) => {setlayouts (lay aaؤt) ؛} ؛wapsy ( {aaitmza۔ myp ((aaitm ، andayks) => (

))} ) ؛} dayfalt ghrda braamd kryn؛ is msaal main ، hum mthark mwad kay sath darygh aybl aur ryj aybl ghrda la aaؤt bnanay kay liye ry aykt-ghrda lyt aaؤt sy zamha dar ghrdaly aaؤt jzaw ka astamal karty hayn۔ham apni mrzuy kay mtaabk akhtyarat jesay amyj swrs aur taitl kay sath zaahar hony wali ashyaa ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ hum ghrda la aaؤt ko la aaؤt ، aanly aaؤt chynj ، bryk pwaints ، kwls ، aur rwhaait prwps kay sath pysh karty hain ، jo mrzuy kay mtaabk akhtyarat aur astailza kay sath ghrda la aaؤt ko zaahar karain ghay۔yha sirf ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah ayk darygh aybl aur rysaiza aybl ghrda la aaؤt ko mthark mwad kay sath rd aml main rd aml main rd aml main rd aml main pyda kya jaiay۔as ko haasal karnay kay bohat sary aur tarykay hain ، aur is mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk aml draamd mkhtlf hawskta haay۔dwsray wsail jesay 12345 may azuafy bsayrt aur msaalyn fraham karty hain

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo kesi API ki tjawyza kay sath srch aatwmplyt darap daaؤn dkhata haay۔
Answer: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnanay kay l that jo kesi API ki tjawyza kay sath srch aatwwmplyt darap daaؤn dkhata hay ، hum dstyab bohat sy wsail main sy ayk astamal krsktay hain ، jesay ry aykt tlash-aatwkwmplyt laibryry 12۔yha laibryry kesi API ki taraf sy kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn main tjawyza kay sath srch aatwmplyt darap daaؤn shaml karnay ka ayk aasan aur tkhsaysa bkhsh tarykha fraham krty haay۔ yahan ayk API ki tjawyza kay sath srch aatw kmplyt darap daaؤn bnanay kay liye rd aml ki tlash main aatwmkwmplyt laibryry ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: is ki ayk msaal haay۔"rd aml" sy jsximport ka rd aml ؛ draamd {rdaml srchtwkwmplyt} sy "rd aml ki tlash-aatwkwmplyt" ؛ fnkshn srch ({aanrch}) {kwnst hayndalnsarch = (strngh ، ntaij) => {aan srch (ntaij) ؛} ؛wapsy (<ReactsearchAutocomplete aaitmza = {[]} onsearch = {hayndaln srch} plys hawldar = "tlash" />)} dayfalt srch braamd karain ؛ is msaal main ، hum srch aatw kwwmplyt sy Reactsearchautocomplete ajzaaa ka astamal karty hain takha srch aatw kwwmplyt darap daaؤn tyar kya jaskay۔ayk API ki tjawyza kay sath۔jb tlash ki jati hay tou hum aan srch fnkshn ko blaya janay ki wzuahat karty hayn۔rd aml ki tlash kay aatw kamplyt ka astamal karty hoey rd aml main kesi API ki tjawyza kay sath srch aatwmplyt darap daaؤn kesay bnaiyn۔as ko haasal karnay kay bohat sary aur tarykay hain ، aur is mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk aml draamd mkhtlf hawskta haay۔dwsray wsail jesay AS341526 may azuafy bsayrt aur msaalyn fraham karty hain

Answer: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnanay kay l that jo tlash kay kabl akhtyarat aur kstm ryndar afaal kay sath ayk darap daaؤn slykt fylda pysh krta hay ، hum dstyab bohat sy wsail main sy ayk astamal krsktay hain ، jesay ry aykt slykt laibryry 1234۔yha laibryry ayk ry aykt ayply kyshn main tlash kay kabl akhtyarat aur kstm ryndar afaal kay sath darap daaؤn slykt fylda ko shaml karnay ka ayk aasan aur hasb zurwrt tarykha mhaya krty haay۔ yahan tlash kay kabl akhtyarat aur kstm ryndar kay sath darap daaؤn slykt fylda bnanay kay liye ry aykt slykt laibryry ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay۔afaal: jsximport react ، {usestate} sy "rd aml" sy "" rd aml slykt "say mntkhb karain ؛ fnkshn darap daaؤn ({akhtyarat ، aan chynj}) {const [mntkhb krdha aapshn ، syt slyktda aapshn] = usestate (null) ؛const hayndalchynj = (aapshn) => {syt slykytdapshn (aapshn) ؛aan chynj (aapshn) ؛} ؛wapsy (<mntkhb krdha kymt = {mntkhb krdha aapshn} aan chynj = {hayndal chynj} akhtyarat = {akhtyarat} jary srch aybl = {sch} getOptionLabel = {(aapshn) => aapshn.lybl} getOptionValue = {(aapshn) => aapshn.aylyw} plys hawldar ="ayk aapshn mntkhb kryn" />) ؛} braamd dayfalt darap daaؤn ؛ is msaal main ، hum tlash kay kabl akhtyarat aur kstm ryndar afaal kay sath darap daaؤn slykt fylda bnanay kay liye ry aykt slykt sy mntkhb jzaw ka astamal karty hayn۔ham apni mrzuy kay mtaabk akhtyarat jesay lybl aur wylyw kay sath zaahar hony waly akhtyarat ki wzuahat karty hayn۔aapshnza aur astailza۔ nwt karain keh yeh sirf ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah tlash kay kabl akhtyarat aur kstm ryndar afaal kay sath darap daaؤn slykt fylda tshkyl diya jaye js main rd aml ka astamal karty hoey rd aml ka astamal kya jaiay۔as ko haasal karnay kay bohat sary aur tarykay hain ، aur is mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk aml draamd mkhtlf hawskta haay۔dwsray wsail jesay 123456 myl azuafy bsayrt aur msaalyn fraham karty hain
